name: Quake: Forgotten Sepulcher
summary: Huge and intricately detailed map set in a medieval swampy environment. Loosely based on E1M3. New monsters, new textures, a new soundtrack, another great "sock" map pack. This map pack requires Arcane Dimensions to work (included) and should last an experienced player one hour of playtime.

name: Queen's Cards
summary: Roguelike deck-building strategy game. Combine decks compatible with your chosen playstyle, deliver satisfying damage, and cast powerful spells to defend your territory in this card-themed strategy game.

name: QuVerse
summary: QuVerse is exciting and challenging action matching puzzle. Basic rule is very simple, Make top of Cube to same color. but this world's system is unstable, for matching color of Cube, you should move Logically and swiftly. Challenge your Limit, break the record!

name: Quetzal
summary: Quetzal is a free online gaming platform that allows Twitch streamers to host live quizzes with their viewers without the need for them to leave the stream. Participants can simply respond in the chat to be automatically counted as players, without requiring any additional connection.

name: Quartermain and the Cult of Cthulhu
summary: Take up arms against Cultists, Nazis, Robots, and Lovecraftian monsters in this fast-paced action adventure. It’s down to you, Aloysius Quartermain, to sneak a 12,000 year old Artefact out of Nazi Germany by emptying lead into anything that moves.

name: Quadratic Puzzle 3
summary: Dive into the captivating world of Quadratic Puzzle 3, a delightful jigsaw puzzle game where your goal is to piece together beautifully illustrated images. Sharpen your spatial reasoning skills and strategic thinking to arrange the disrupted pieces into perfect harmony. The faster you complete the puzzle, the higher your score!

name: Quest 4 Papa: Reloaded
summary: Quest 4 Papa: Reloaded is a story-driven top-down shooter experience where the player will upgrade its equipment as it progressively faces greater dangers through its adventure.

name: Quest for Infamy
summary: Quest For Infamy is a classic point and click adventure game, in which you assume the identity of 'Mister Roehm' a man trying to start over after running away from a shady past. Welcome to the little town of Volksville only to discover there is so much more going on in the valley than meets the eye! Come along and take a walk on the wild side with Roehm and discover just how infamous you might be.

name: Quest Arrest
summary:
A detective RPG released for the Game Boy in 2020.

The game follows the main protagonist, recently promoted, Detective Allison Bennett on her quest for clean up her city, Strange Meadows, after the recent crime spree that has thrown the city into chaos. Athena, and her gang, has been terrorizing the residents and has set her sights on taking over the city for herself.

name: Quadrillion
summary: "Quadrillion" presents an immersive alternate-history experience set in the backdrop of a darkly reimagined First World War. This first-person game masterfully blends elements of dark fantasy with a unique retro aesthetic, offering players a captivating and eerie world to explore.

name: Quiet Godo
summary: You're home alone. Explore the rooms, find the keys, and, most of all, watch your tongue!

name: Quiz Seikai ha Ichinengo presents Atsushi no Meitantei
summary:
One day at the TBS studio… immediately after the recording of Quiz Seikai wa Ichingengo, a completely transformed Razor Ramon RG was discovered behind the studio!

“This is a murder case…!” Activating his gray brain cells, Detective Atsushi Tamura sets off on an investigation. Inexplicable testimonies, suspicious activities with no alibi, and co-stars going every which way…

In the name of the MC, he will definitely uncover the truth!

name: Quest of Jackal: Puzzle game
summary: Mojack in the quest to find its precious treasures. Mojack is on the verge to travel through the adventurous world where lots of mysterious puzzled path is filled with deadly traps. The adventurous world is filled with beautiful landscape and complex architectures.

name: Queen of Minecarts
summary: A Playdate game about making sure Minecarts get to where they're going.

name: Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor
summary: You are in a barbarian land. They are trying to kill you. The Queen demands you tame them. So what now? Escape into an exciting, open-ended story and cunning tactical combat. Epic, indie fantasy adventure. Freely explore a huge world, fight for fame and power, and shape the world as you choose.

name: QuAaargh!!!
summary: QuAaargh is a great game for developing reflex skills, speed, and perceptivity. It features 150 fun randomly generated levels and 140 unique symbols to make each iteration one-of-a-kind. Within each level the player is given a set time limit in which they have to complete the challenge put forward. So be quick and share your score with friends through online leader boards.

name: Quinn's Aquarium
summary: Help the Quinn Sisters restore their family aquarium in this story-driven mahjong adventure. Every level brings you closer to happy fish and crowd-pleasing exhibits.

name: Queen's Quest 2: Stories of Forgotten Past
summary: Conduct an investigation as shapeshifter!

name: Quake II
summary: This version of Quake II differs from the other releases by replacing most of the levels with new ones. Some of the levels have familiar themes or even re-create the original ones closely; however, new stages are dominant, tending to be significantly shorter than those of the PC version. This release also features additional graphical effects, such as lighting during gunfire. Multiplayer for up to four participants is included.

name: Quake Collection
summary: This Steam download pack includes: Quake, Quake Mission Pack 1: Scourge of Armagon, Quake Mission Pack 2: Dissolution of Eternity, Quake II, Quake II Mission Pack: The Reckoning, Quake II Mission Pack: Ground Zero, Quake III: Arena, Quake III: Team Arena.

name: Quest: The Adventure for the 6 Stones
QuickCalculation
summary: Quick Calculations is a game based on the four operations of math made to test the player's reaction time and ability to quickly reverse calculations.

name: Quinty
summary: Quinty is an unreleased puzzle game that developed by Game Freak for the Super Famicom in 1999. The game was a remake of the Famicom/NES game of the same name, which is also titled Mendel Palace outside of Japan. On October 12, 2024, 3 prototype builds of the game were leaked during the 2024 Game Freak Leak.

name: Queen's Wish: The Conqueror
summary: At last, the Queen has given you power and freedom! The cost? You must rebuild her Empire. Will you? In this epic, indie fantasy adventure, you are free to explore, fight for fame and power, and shape the world as you choose. Escape into an unpredictable open-ended story and cunning tactical combat.

name: Quest for a Punchline: The Collection
Quiz Magic Academy 8
summary: The eigth game in the long running Quiz arcade game series by Konami

name: Qubica
summary: A next-generation sandbox game heavily inspired by The Blockheads. All about exploring, building, and playing together. Mine resources, craft tools, build a cozy cabin or an entire city.

name: Quinb: 4 Players Reaction Game
summary:
Quinb is a reaction / logic game for up to 4 players on the same device.

It contains many minigames in which you have to answer questions as fast as you can to get a point.
If the answer is correct you score a point, otherwise you lose one.

name: Quarto
summary: Quarto is a subtle strategy game with the simplest of rules. With more than one million units sold, this abstract game is a masterpiece with worldwide fame.

name: Qualia 3: Multi Agent
summary:
In Qualia 3: Multi Agent, you take form of an evolving creature - a "Multi Agent", comprised of three base creature elements. To become stronger and to overcome your adversaries, you will need to adapt and gain access to new forms. The only way to do this is to kill other creatures, collect their energy, and obtain trophies that unlock new forms. If successful, you will gain dominion over the deep sea and become its apex predator! Should you fail, your fate will be sealed as just another forgettable part of the food chain.

In the unknown expanse of the deep sea, survival of the fittest is taken to a whole new level. The weak and slow perish while the strong survive. To withstand the unforgiving nature of the depths, its denizens must adapt. For many, the only survival option is to evolve into an exotic and dangerous being.

name: Quical
summary: This game was made by a Japanese student alone! Developed to be a casual and casual Battle Royale.Since it is only single play, there is no trouble for teammates or rants in VC! (Team mode is also planned to be implemented) One game lasts less than 5 minutes, so you can feel free to play in the free time!

name: QuestionBank
summary: Challenge the limits of your knowledge! This is an exciting trivia competition game with millions of questions waiting for you to conquer. Come join the challenge—who will become the ultimate King of Knowledge?

name: Quarters, Please!
summary: "Quarters, Please!" is a bustling arcade playground. Relax and watch the neighborhood kids enjoy playing, or kick them off and play the games yourself. Can you rise to the challenge and beat their high scores? Test your skills in five exciting arcade games inspired by retro classics: "Nebula" - Destroy wave after wave of dive-bombing insectoid aliens. "Dino Dig" - Protect your underground lair by breathing fire on the invading ghost miners. "Bound 'n Bash" - Drive, smash and jump your way through numerous challenging stages of fast-paced racing action. "Meteors" - Blow those pesky space rocks into tiny bits. "Face Invaders" - The alien horde descends. Shoot them all and protect your base!

name: Quest Rooms
summary: You wake up in an obscure room, a voice in the TV says that it is just a quest where you have to find the way out. Brute force is not enough to survive to get out of the room you will have to be patient, use your brain and have grit.

name: Quicksand
summary: Quicksand is a hardcore third-person shooter game that takes you on a thrilling journey through the heart of the Middle East with 26 well designed levels. Set in a war-torn region, the game combines intense action, strategic gameplay, and a gripping storyline to create an unforgettable experience.

name: Quarries of Scred
summary: Bringing classic arcade games such as Boulder Dash and Dig Dug into the 21st century, Quarries Of Scred is an unapologetically brutal, retro-inspired arcade game designed to see just how far you'll go to risk your bounty.

name: Quake 3 Rally
summary: Quake 3 Rally, also known as Q3Rally, is an open-source combat racing game on the ioquake3 engine, turning the classic Quake 3 into a racing shoot 'em up with many arena and racing gamemodes. Along with a plethora of mods, online support is also available. Q3R is very similar to the Half-Life Rally mod.

name: Quake3Quest
summary:
It's the real deal: Quake 3 in full VR. This port brings the frantic action of Q3:Arena to Virtual Reality.

Another Id-software classic brought to VR by Team Beef & Friends.

Features:

Frantic Single Player Campaign
Multiplayer in local wifi or online
Dedicated VR-only servers
Intuitive Weapons Selection
Fully Tracked Weapons
features additional mappacks via companion app
4 maps inlcuded, you can jump into action right away.
Unique Quest Home enviroment included (by Robyer1)
Use the Companion App for streamlined hd mod and mappack installation. The app is in "unknown sources". Use it to change your player name as well.

name: Quadratank
summary: One of Digital Eclipse's Atari Reimagined games released as part of the Atari 50 collection, Quadratank expands on the original Combat with four-player versus tank battles across different terrain types and new modes, like Capture the Flag.

name: Qu Zone
summary: Lost in the Hoh Rainforest, inside a shifting dead zone akin to the Bermuda Triangle, you have 30 days to find extraction or be trapped forever. Qu Zone is a roguelike extraction game where every run puts your exploration, crafting, and bartering skills to the final test.

name: Quiverless
summary: Quiverless is a fast-paced pixel-art dungeon crawler made to challenge your precision and strategy. Armed with only a single arrow, you must skillfully retrieve and reuse it to defeat relentless monsters lurking in dark and treacherous dungeons.

name: Quickshot
summary: The makers of The Tower send you to the Quickshot boot camp to give you a fighting chance in the war against the machines. Use pistols, shotguns, lasers, submachine guns and chain guns to take down targets launched at you and avoid obstacles to not get smashed. Open fire in slow motion and get in cover when getting shot at or wield a weapon from more civilized days.

name: Queen's Quest 5: Symphony of Death
summary: When the kingdom is shaken as children are being kidnapped, the court alchemist and best detective decides to take matters into her own hands. Using elixirs and shapeshifting magic, you have to stop the dreadful sound of the deadly symphony.

name: Quake II Mission Pack: Ground Zero
summary:
Take out the Big Gun sounded simple enough, except the Strogg were waiting. You, and a few marines like you, are the lucky ones. You've made it down in one piece and are still able to contact the fleet. The Gravity Well, the Strogg's newest weapon in its arsenal against mankind, is operational. With the fleet around Stroggos, 5% of ground forces surviving, and that number dwindling by the second, your orders have changed: free your comrades. Destroy the Gravity Well.

New Enemies - The Stalker, Turrets, Daedalus, Medic Commander, Carrier, and the Black Widow. 14 Entirely new levels and 10 new deathmatch levels.

New Power-Ups - Deathmatch specific power-ups: Vengeance Sphere, Hunter Sphere, and Anti-matter bomb. New Weapons - The Chainsaw, ETF Rifle and Plasma Beam.

name: Quell Reflect
summary: An enchanting puzzle game of logic and relaxation.

name: Qumino
summary: Qumino is a cozy roguelike domino game. Lay back, grab your controller, and enjoy playing. There are different heroes with unique abilities that make every deck playthrough different. Build your deck with different domino tiles and think about what you need for the run.

name: Quiet Express: Cabin 909
summary: “Do you know anything about Cabin 909?” You're a passenger on a transcontinental train. Looking for a room that's nowhere to find: Cabin 909.

name: Quadrium 2
summary: Quadrium is back with a new and exciting mash-up of marble popper and match-3 challenge! Discover new bonuses and antibonuses and develop new strategies. Use mines to clear the field with explosive chain reactions and encounter fun boss battles that pit you against exciting challengers.

name: Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary
summary: Entirely rebuilt from the ground up, Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler.

name: Queenlash
summary:
Why should we survive this, who would be there if we did? Do you feel from your statues? In your busts, do you dream? Why not die, if it kills you not to? The problem for a queen is she is one place, one people, incarnated godhood chained to a self worship. We feel as we do, forced to be a mastery, the master in the mirror is the medium, autochthon artist, but I, I am an undefined, protean in describabbles, those who resist my boundless empress me in compass, I am all the unknown in the bleeding to reach. Ghosts dance my polytones, the bones of my colossus bridge my whys keystones. Why should you see me as who I am, when that has never been enough for me?

Queenlash is an interactive novel about the life of Cleopatra told from the perspectives of eight women.

name: Queendoom
summary: Queendoom is an Archery Tower Defense game designed from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Be the Queen your kingdom needs and defend them, so go get your bow and manage your army in the campaign to slay the demon creatures that want to destroy you and your people.

name: Quizei
summary:
Quizei is a browser-based multiplayer quiz platform where users compete in trivia, music, and photo challenges. Players can guess songs, artists, locations, and dates, or take part in tournament modes like Bracket, This or That, Blind Ranking, and Tier List. Quizei also supports live interactive play with Kick, Twitch, and YouTube audiences, making it a social, fast-paced quiz experience for everyone.

Live Play: Real-time viewer interaction via streaming platforms.

name: Quoth The Raven
summary: Quoth the Raven is the 28th installment of the Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series, created by BluePineapple72. The event ran during June of 2023, in which maps were created in a time limit of 8 hours or less. Mappers were to create Heretic maps using a custom texture pack and calling back to several of the design tropes from the original Heretic. It contains 3 episodes, with forced secret exits, for a total of 27 maps.

name: Quest of Hat
summary: A mini-sequel to EarthBound, Hat Quest is one of the most advanced hacks released to date. It's also the first finalized hack to make liberal use of map editing, advanced event-based changes, and a bevy of other recent discoveries. This game was made with classic puzzle adventure games in mind, so expect a lot of old-school LucasArts-style action.

name: Quake II Mission Pack: The Reckoning
summary: You are part of an elite commando force that must infiltrate a hostile alien cite. Once inside, you must scour industrial landscapes, crawl through waterways and air ducts, navigate treacherous canyons teeming with vicious mutants, stow away on an alien spacecraft, and destroy the enemy's secret moon base.

name: Quake: Mission Pack 1 - Scourge of Armagon
summary: After defeating Shub-Niggurath, you arrive back at your home base on Earth, but it's not all blue skies and butterflies. Apparently, not all QUAKE forces have been subdued. Chaos ensues as you blast your way through the QUAKE minions and toward the infested gateway. Your only choice is to find the source of evil and shut it down. Without any hesitation, and with more guts than common sense, you leap into a portal of unknown destination.

name: Quake: Mission Pack 2 - Dissolution of Eternity
summary:
Two new episodes. Sixteen new levels. One way out.

Your journey has led you down a path of no return. The acrid smell of death fills the air. And you know the road ahead may lead to your grave. But Quake, with his insidious, apocalyptic plans, must be crushed. If you fail, evil will shroud the universe for all eternity.

name: Quarantine City
summary: Survive alone against a never ending horde of undead! How long can you survive?

name: Quantum Dogfight
summary: Quantum Dogfight is a 2-player guessing strategy game where players must correctly locate all of their opponent's planes on a hexagonal grid. Inspired by the principles of quantum mechanics, Quantum Dogfght is a fun and interactive way to learn about superposition and measurement collapse.

name: Quarth
summary: Famicom port of Block Hole.

name: Quiz & Variety SukuSuku Inufuku
summary: "Quiz & Variety SukuSuku Inufuku" is an arcade game released by Video System in 1998. While quizzes are the main, many mini-games are included. Clear them and raise a dog-like creature called "Inufuku".

name: QUByte Classics: Zero Tolerance Collection by Piko
summary:
QUByte Classics: Zero Tolerance Collection by Piko combines Zero Tolerance, Zero Tolerance Underground and the unlockable prototype of Beyond Zero Tolerance to an ultimate compilation of 16-bit shooter action!

First released in 1994 for Sega Mega Drive/Sega Genesis, Zero Tolerance sets players in a distant future where the universe has to face an alien invasion. That’s when the Zero Tolerance team is being called to protect mankind from the enemy!

name: Quintus and the Absent Truth
summary: A Horror-Adventure Game Featuring a Man and his Mouse. Alan Shaw is struggling to find his Daughter, to find her he needs help from his closest friend, Quintus, an intelligent little rodent.

name: Qualia: The Path of Promise
summary: “Machina” is the world's first android to pass the Turing Test. Incidentally, she is also dressed like a maid. Dr. Hiro Koshino ends up taking Machina home and has her work as a maid. As she continues to learn and grow, he also begins to develop certain feelings towards her…

name: QuizApp
summary: Welcome to QuizApp, the ultimate Trivia Network where your knowledge meets social interaction! Dive into a dynamic blend of quiz game and social network, designed for quiz enthusiasts and social butterflies alike.

name: Queen's Tales: The Beast and the Nightingale - Collector's Edition
summary: To save your father from a hideous monster, you've decided to sacrifice your own freedom. Now you must journey through a strange and magical land before time runs out!

name: Q.U.B.E. 2: Ultimate Edition
summary: Includes ALL downloadable content for Q.U.B.E. 2: Classic Gloves, Lost Orbit, Aftermath. In Q.U.B.E. 2 you play as Amelia Cross, an archaeologist who has awoken among the ruins of an alien landscape. With the distant help of another survivor you must manipulate the structure of this mysterious world and find a way back home. As you explore and solve puzzles to progress, thought-provoking questions about your true purpose and the origins of the structure you are navigating will need to be considered, forcing you to come to terms with a devastating truth that will shake your world.

name: Quodan: Treachery on the Arheid
summary: When the Arheid III is sabotaged by a spy aboard the spaceship, Captain John Will Smith must get to the bottom of it or risk another attack.

name: Quantum Lake
summary:
In Quantum Lake the player drives a growing party of bright polygonal fishes through the depths of complex labyrinths inside a cosmic lake. Each with its own abilities like super-speed, resistance to electricity or explosive power, the fishes will need to complete the 25 levels by catching the all of the hidden crystals while trying not to be annihilated by some other fishes made of anti-matter.
The game might seem quite simple and repetitive at the beginning, but it grows very quickly in difficulty and includes a series of puzzles that will require a great deal of both the player's thumb agility and smartness to complete.

name: Quad Fighter K
summary: Quad Fighter K is a classic 8-bit arcade shooter game.

name: Quiet Rehabilitation
summary: Quiet Rehabilitation is a FREE Half-Life 2 single-player modification that tells a different story of Gordon Freeman being taken prisoner directly to Nova Prospekt. In this alternate route, without meeting Barney, he must find a way to escape from this old facility heavily guarded by Combine forces and surrounded by unusual creatures.

name: QuestMania
summary: Questmania is the third game in Nadeo's "Mania" series of user-generated content-focused games, this time with an RPG slant!

name: Quarters, Please! Vol. 2
summary: The "Quarters, Please!" arcade playground is back, with five new, exciting arcade games inspired by retro classics. Relax and watch the neighborhood kids enjoy playing, or kick them off and play the games yourself!

name: Quack my Duck
summary: Caution, we've lost our ducks! Help John find all the ducks scattered around the city. An exciting hidden object adventure game for all ages.

name: Quest: Escape Room
summary: Imagine your dream date. That's what supposed to be with our hero, when he goes out with his beautiful girl. But his dream date suddenly becomes the survival game. Help him solve some riddles, pass difficult challenges, and escape the deadly laboratory.

name: Quest Master's Realm: Land of the Phoenix
summary:
Dungeon Expansion for Quest Master's Realm.

Strange phenomena have been reported in the Orcazelos Desert , unexplained disturbances originating from below the surface.

Your job is to investigate, discover what is going on there.

Combat a new range of foes beneath the desert in the exciting Dungeon, 'The Solace of Q'ro'.

Mythical treasures await those who dare to venture here, a new range of equipment unavailable elsewhere in the game!

name: Quell 4D
summary: Quell 4D is a VR FPS for the HTC Vive. It's a game about shooting first and asking questions later, in a retro vector art style.

name: Qube Qross
summary: Qube Qross is a challenging and logical puzzle game, like Nonogram in 3D. The puzzles can be solved by the hints of numbers in the left and right sides of walls, players need to get where and how many cubes are located, by the intersection of numbers from left and right walls in the same height axis. And use your controller to place all the cubes in the right position to solve a puzzle. In the classic mode, we have 10 stages with different themes, there are 10 levels in each stage, all the puzzles you solve are aww-ing cute voxel models.

name: Quriocity
summary: Quriocity is a sci-fi city builder game set on a bare alien planet very similar to Earth. Build and upgrade a wide variety of units to extract resources and provide services, such as maintenance, food production, education, entertainment and many more.

name: Quaantuum Strike
summary: Step into the future with Quantum Strike, a high-octane Mixed Reality VR shooter where the world around you warps and transforms in real time! Designed exclusively for the Meta Quest 3, this game blends your real-world environment with intense combat scenarios, forcing you to react, adapt, and dominate the battlefield like never before.

name: Quack & Hatch
summary: Breed, hatch, and level up ducks of all rarities on your incremental duck farm! Make your ducks work for food to level them up to unlock rarer breeds with unique traits. Can you hatch the rarest ducks? Start farming now!

name: Queen Slayer
summary: 'Queen Slayer' is a turn-based RPG set in a fascinating fantasy world. The player must lead heroes of various professions and skills to defeat the powerful queens who dominate the underground dungeons and save the kingdom from darkness.

name: Quadcubes
summary: Quadcubes is a minimalist puzzle game where you move, rotate, and stack falling blocks across all three axes to fill and clear layers. Play at your own pace or take on an increasing challenge as the speed rises and try to reach the highest score you can.

name: Queen's Gate: Spiral Chaos
summary:
This is the sequel to Queen's Blade: Spiral Chaos.
It features returning game exclusive characters Jean and Cute, and introduces a new heroine, Maron Makaron.
It also features characters from other forms of media, such as the Soul Calibur, Tekken, Dead or Alive, Samurai Showdown, BlazBlue, Guilty Gear, and the King of Fighters fighting game series, as well as other anime and manga series.

name: Queen's Garden 2
summary: In Queen's Garden 2, the Princess became a queen! Help her loyal assistant Jack rebuild the royal garden from scratch in this unique match 3 game.

name: Quantized
summary: Quantized is an audio reactive, procedurally-generated sensory experience. Play your own local songs to generate a fun, exhilarating musical journey.

name: Quest for Camelot
summary: King Arthur has lost his legendary sword, Excalibur. Now the evil Sir Ruber is out to claim Camelot. Since the King is unable to fight, he trusts a young girl named Kayley to fight for him and save his Kingdom. You take the role of Kayley as you explore nine worlds and a total of 60 areas in search of Excalibur. Along the way, you will have to learn how to use several devices including a slingshot, snorkel, and grappling hook to perform tasks and solve puzzles. Naturally, Sir Ruber has henchmen out to stop you, but use your sword to dispatch them. As the game progresses, you will learn a powerful spin-attack as well as dart- and lunge-attacks. Will Kayley be able to save Camelot? Will finding Excalibur be enough to help King Arthur? Find the answers to these questions by playing QUEST FOR CAMELOT.

name: QuantZ
summary: Experience a new dimension of puzzle action game fun in QuantZ for the PC; a fabulous adventure that goes beyond the Action-Puzzler, Match-3 and Marble Popper genres. The gameplay is simple yet addictive: you have the power to control a cube with your mouse and drop marbles onto it.

name: Quandary
summary: Quandary is a 2D puzzle platformer where you navigate puzzles with two separate characters, each embodying a side of your conscience and moving in opposite directions, Can you find harmony within this inner chaos and solve puzzles that seem impossible?

name: Qubicks
summary: Qubicks is where tower defense meets roguelike as you venture across procedurally generated levels where you strategically position towers, balancing immediate survival with long-term growth. Upgrade your towers and heroes to adapt to difficult waves and ensure victory against alien inhabitants.

name: Quack Magic
summary: A curse has befallen the pond and trapped the ducklings. Luckily, you are not only a duck but also a wizard. Use your duckly powers to break reality and restore order to the pond.

name: Quintillion Quest
summary: A fantasy-themed run-based active incremental game

name: Quarked up Omnibus: Clean - Fix - Escape
summary: Quarked Up Omnibus is a 2D space exploration adventure game where you can walk around planets, and seamlessly fly to numerous other planets. Clean, Fix, and Exterminate your way through a day-by-day story, and plot your escape.

name: Questprobe featuring Spider-Man
summary: The second in Scott Adams' series of Questprobe text adventures, starring Spider-Man.

name: Quality Dreams, Reasonably Priced
summary: Work as a body modification consultant in a dystopian future. Talk to clients, make recommendations, and decide how much to upsell them. Your choices will impact each of their lives. Balance helping others with earning enough to save your sick rabbit.

name: Questboard
summary: A text-based RPG where your choices and dice rolls determine the outcome of every quest. Embark on adventures, help townsfolk, battle enemies, and engage in immersive minigames like fishing, dice rolling, and gauntlet challenges.

name: Quiz Time
summary: Quiz Time is all in one Quiz Package for everyone. You can play any type of quizzes like Sports Quiz, G.K Quiz, Songs Quiz, Maths Quiz, Entertainment Quiz and Many more.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Quantumleaper
summary:
In Quantumleaper, you'll use your Superposition ability to solve puzzles that would be otherwise impossible to complete. Duplicate your position with a single button and press it again to switch between your two selves at any time, no matter how far.
You can use your other self to activate switches, mislead enemies and block projectiles. Sometimes, even tunnel through walls. As you progress, new components will require you to find new ways to advance – using both intelligence and skill. It's a huge maze filled with deadly puzzles.

name: Quadricolor: Ultra Sentai Color Ranger
summary: Put on your sentai hero suit and join the chromatic battle! Protect the color balance in this lightning-fast 2D arena shooter. Snack it on with friends on a couch or online up to 4 players. Fight against evil forces and rise through the ranks in Quadricolor: Ultra Sentai Color Rangers.

name: Quantum Robot
summary: Quantum Robot is a first person shooter with rougelite elements and short levels each ending in a boss fight.

name: Quantum Witch
summary: Wake up lovely, you've got things to do! First, find your lost flock of faer. Then find your wife, she'd look so cute wearing that flower you found. And if you have time, attack and dethrone god. Ok? Don't worry about that portal. I'm sure it's nothing. Now be careful. Every choice matters.

name: Quiz 50 Ways to Read the Kanji 生
summary:
The Many Readings of the Japanese Kanji “生”
Learn Them Through a Fun Quiz!

name: Quake: Func Jam 8
summary:
Func Jam 8 is a community project at Func_Msgboard.
This pack features four Film Noir / black&white-themed levels as well as a start map and comes bundled with Arcane Dimensions enemies. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require a source port with increased limits.

name: Quizarium
summary:
Are you too brainy to keep it to yourself? Then try the new Quizarium app to pit your wits against other smarties like yourself. Select a category, answer fast, and participate in numerous tournaments.
In Quizarium you have one minute to answer the question. And so do any of your competitors. Every 12 seconds you get a hint: the number of letters in the puzzle, 1st letter, 2nd letter… Well, we’re sure you’ll get it right much faster! Various questions to challenge your intellect are wrapped in juicy graphics. And rest assured, it’s not just good old Geography and Biology questions in there. The other way round, you’ll find plenty of LOL questions in this app that will still challenge your mind.

name: Quadron
summary:
"Quadron is an original arcade style game for the 48K ZX Spectrum created in the mould of the 1980s Williams classics. 
 
Set in the Quadron complex, you are charged with the task of defending the crystals mined by the relentless onset of marauding aliens. 
 
Featuring fast arcade style gameplay, multiple weapons, enemies, collectables, powerups, and a pointer based status screen and scanner, the game calls for both fast reactions and a surprising dose of strategy!" 
 
"The game was written in assembler on the Spectrum over the course of two years and completed in early 1988. Sadly, the publisher (now defunct) pulled out towards the end of development and the game remained unreleased along with its plans for an Amstrad CPC conversion. Now on its 30th anniversary I'm making it available for anyone interested. 
 
While I don't have access to the original source code, I do have many of my original notes and have been working with the disassembly to prepare the game for release with a few tweaks and bug fixes. 
 
As part of the downloads I've also made available scans of the basic and detailed instruction printouts from 1987, complete with the original spelling / grammatical errors!"

name: Quest: Samuel Prince Attorney at Law Chapter 3
summary: The third of seven chapters of a courtroom battle style visual novel, in which the story follows brand new lawyer Samuel Prince as he solves a strange variety of different crimes. Acquire evidence by investigating the crime scene, then use it in court when cross examining witnesses to cleave through all the lies and find your way to the truth. In this chapter, Samuel Prince becomes newly acquainted with a senior college student, but a new case ends up enveloping the both of them.

name: Quest Town Saga
summary:
A dark shadow was cast on a certain peaceful little town... Well, no, actually it was just a bunch of silly-looking monsters suddenly causing trouble. Anyway, someone's got to teach them a lesson, and that's you!

Help out the townsfolk and they'll let you take charge of their town, building it as you like. Plus, you get to be a respected hero. Some get their treasure from quests. Some get items and money from managing a town. But why not both?!

Create a party of characters with different Classes, like Knight or Beast Tamer. Have pet monsters fight alongside. Choose your weapons and armor based on the elemental affinity of your foes to hit hard while taking less damage yourself.

You can do it all in style, as there are lots of outfits for you to choose. And if you think looking human is boring, no problem! Wear a dragon, cat, dog, or fox costume. No one's going to judge you! Show off your cool character at the Online Plaza, and maybe even quest together with another player.

Embark on an epic yet laid-back adventure in this town-building RPG. It's fun whether your priority is to save the world or get a stylish hat.

name: Queens Casino
summary: Enjoy playing at the casino with the original card game, "Queens"! In each turn, cards are randomly dealt, and you play them according to specific rules. If you can clear all the "challenges" presented by the heroine, you win.

name: Quur
summary:
Violence is not always your best option.

In a world sustained by a magical liquid, called the Color, you embody an ethereal being capable of manipulating it.
Every action you take will have a direct impact on the forest of Quur and on the creatures who inhabit it.

name: Quetzal
summary: Quetzal is the ultimate indie deck builder based on Aztec mythology.

name: QuickSwitch
summary: Fast Multiplayer 2D shooter, focusing on skills and timing. Vast variety of gamemodes, maps, weapons, skins. Fight for your ranking and glory !

name: Queers in Love at the End of the World
summary: fellas, is it gay to make out in the ashes of capitalism?

name: QuietMansion1
summary: Explore a dark and creepy mansion crawling with terrifying monsters, find keys, and use weapons to fight back as you try to find your way out!

name: Quern: Undying Thoughts
summary:
Quern is a first person puzzle adventure with captivating story and beautiful graphics. Quern refreshes the genre with flexible gameplay and reuseable puzzle mechanics. The visuals and the music combine traditional and modern elements providing a unique mood for the game.

One of the specialities of Quern is that the tasks to be solved are not managed as separate, individual and sequential units, but as a complex entity, amongst which the players may wander and experiment freely. Often a bad or seemingly irrational result may bring the player closer to the final solution, if those are reconsidered and thought over again later, in the possession of the knowledge gained during the game.

name: Quake: Reliquary
summary: First "alpha" version of a mod based on Copper with some new and modified weapons, such as a pistol and triple-barreled shotgun, and more challenging gameplay. It comes with two levels plus a start map: a medium-sized sewage facility and a large medieval castle dungeon. The map sources are included.

name: Quirky Museum
summary: A museum and its stories… Think you know everything about them? To truly feel history, to sense the connection between generations of life and memory, one visit won’t be enough.

name: Quiz Magic Academy Ake no Arcadia
QuackSquad
summary: Join our fearless feathered hero on an epic adventure to defend their pond from an invasion of zombie chickens spawned by sinister fast-food joints lurking nearby. In this thrilling top-down shooter, arm yourself to the beak with an arsenal of weapons as you face off against relentless waves of undead poultry and formidable bosses. But fear not, for you are not alone! Level up your duck, recruit loyal companions, and engage in exciting minigames to bolster your forces.

name: Quest Hunter
summary: Quest Hunter is a story-driven RPG with treasure hunt, puzzles and humor! Mysterious world, fascinating plot, unimaginable puzzles and insidious enemies are waiting for you!

name: Quiz & Dragons: Capcom Quiz Game
summary: The far off land of Capconia lived in peace and prosperity for years thanks in part to the Knowledge Tree, a tree in which the holder of the tree's seeds are granted infinite knowledge of the world around them. However, an evil being known as Gordian has taken a seed of the tree and has planted a Knowledge Tree of his own. Gordian has given some of the seeds to some of the dragons in the land and now, which unfortunate soul who cannot answer any of the dragon's questions correctly will be eaten by them. The King then decides to send out four brave warriors entrusted with the knowledge of the land out to stop Gordian and end his tyranny once and for all.

name: QuickSolve
summary: We offer you several tasks at speed. The number of tasks - 15. Tasks are always given in random order. The most important thing - time. You have to solve the tasks as quickly as possible . On your speed depends on the number of points scored. Incorrect answers lead to a fine and , in the end - to the loss of points. Three difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Advanced. Kinds of tasks: Mathematical operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, comparison), Sequence (numbers, letters, pictures, colors, dots, shapes). There is a table of records (local). The number of tasks will continually increase.

name: Quick Trivia
summary: Quick Trivia is a small multiplayer guessing game — with questions related to gaming.

name: Quiz Tonosama no Yabou 2: Zenkoku-ban
summary: A quiz game with a feudal Japanese theme.

name: QuickSpot
summary: QuickSpot uses simple brain teaser to exercise reflexes and brain function.

name: Quick Math Game
summary:
Test your mind, skill and speed in the fight with time. 
 
Find the required number using 40 different numbers in 4 columns and 10 rows. 
 
First row has four randomized numbers between 1 and 10, second row has randomized numbers from 11-20 and so on.... 
 
Use these numbers to fill up the three fields and apply the four basic elemental operations to achieve the correct number! 
 
Compete with other players in Leader-boards and strive to be on the top!

name: Queerskins: A love story
summary: Queerskins: a love story is a 6DoF interactive virtual reality experience. In this emotionally-charged experience, you are seated in the back seat of a photo-realistic 1986 Cadillac, behind Sebastian's parents, as they take a journey down a country road in rural Missouri. Get to know Sebastian through the drama unfolding in intimate proximity in the front seat as well as by interacting with a collection of Sebastian's personal belongings including his diary. Was he a "disgrace" like his father says or a "good man" as his mother believes?

name: Queen's Quest: Tower of Darkness
summary: Defeat the sorcerer and save your daughter!

name: Quantum Knights
summary: As an open-world TPS RPG, ‘Quantum Knights’ offers a variety of unique charismatic characters and guns for you to combine and create your own playstyle.Become a Volant and explore the vast world while enjoying a true farming and growth experience!

name: Queue Simulator
summary: experience the thrill of waiting in a long line

name: Quiz Pro: Guess Pictures
summary: This quiz game is a great choice when you want to learn something, when you feel boring, or when you want to kill some free time. Can you find the words for every picture? Train your brain and learn new words by solving guessing the pics.

name: QUByte Classics: Thunderbolt Collection by Piko
summary:
Your goal is simple: destroy all the enemies that will come until you reach the final boss of the stage, make it easier and faster as you collect items and power-ups to enhance your health bar, increase your speed and upgrade or acquire new weapons. You’ll lead humanity to survival.

Thunderbolt Collection is a compilation of two vertically-scrolling shoot 'em ups from the series Thunderbolt released in 1995 exclusive on east. The QUByte port brings the 8-bit and 16-bit versions of the game, both with official English localization and new features to improve your experience like: control remapping, which allow players to customize controller buttons as they like it better, different screen types and save states.

name: Quarantine: Global Pandemic
summary: In Quarantine, you make the pandemic policies and funding priorities for your country as the head of the Health and Human Services Department. You will have to save your country from this global pandemic, while trying to keep the public and government officials happy...

name: Quar: Infernal Machines
summary: Quar: Infernal Machines is the 1st ever turn-based-strategy game available for the PlayStation VR, set in the grimmsical world of Alwyd, based on the Table Top Game system "This Quar's War".

name: Quiz Magic Academy 5
summary: The fifth game in the long running Quiz arcade game series by Konami

name: Quiet, Please!
summary:
After an annoying day at school, you just want some peace and quiet. But everything at home is so noisy!
Mr. Peabody is obsessively mowing his lawn, Dad is channel surfing and Mom is yapping on the phone.
Your pesky kid brother won't go to bed, and even your pet kittens are driving you crazy!
Explore, interact with your environment and solve puzzles. 3 kittens included with every purchase!

name: Quadrapassel
summary: Quadrapassel comes from the classic falling-block game, Tetris. The goal of the game is to create complete horizontal lines of blocks, which will disappear. The blocks come in seven different shapes made from four blocks each: one straight, two L-shaped, one square, and two S-shaped. The blocks fall from the top center of the screen in a random order. You rotate the blocks and move them across the screen to drop them in complete lines. You score by dropping blocks fast and completing lines. As your score gets higher, you level up and the blocks fall faster.

name: Quiz Magic Academy DS: Futatsu no Jikuuseki
summary:
Quiz Magic Academy DS - Two Space-Time Stones - is the second QMA consumer game. The genre of the quiz and the flow of the lessons are based on the arcade version 6, and the background and music of 6 are also used.
Elements added in 5 and later, such as the final cut-in, certification exam and touch panel quiz, are also implemented.
Character information is based on 6.
The character's graphics are from 4 and earlier, with some changes.

name: Quiz Thiz Spain: Silver Edition
summary: Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Queer and Chill
summary:
Queer & Chill is a spicy and challenging puzzle full of pride flags, and lots of diversity. Improve your skills while discovering new and exciting ways to match people based on their sexuality.
Learn, evolve, and most of all, be curious.

name: Quest of the Hero
summary: Quest of the Hero is a short session fantasy based dungeon crawler with plenty of depth. Make risky or safe decisions, craft powerful items, defeat enemies, upgrade your skills and explore unique play styles! 30 seconds to jump into it and 10-20 minute dungeon runs.

name: Quadra Break Tetris
summary: Take a break with Quadra Break, a Tetris-like game that reimagines a classic with exciting new modes. Whether you prefer competitive or cooperative gameplay, get ready for the ultimate brain massage!

name: Quake: Abyss of Pandemonium
summary: Abyss of Pandemonium - The Final Mission is a unofficial commercial partial conversion for Quake developed by Impel Development Team and published by Perfect Publishing. It was released on April 14, 1998. It includes 16 new levels (10 single player/6 death match), six new foes, four new weapons and 1 power-up.

name: QUByte Classics: Beat 'Em Up Collection
summary: A collection of seven retro beat 'em ups with enhanced features like rewind, cheats, screen filters, and more!

name: Quintessence
summary:
"Galina has always been Good. How could she not be? Beloved daughter of the town blacksmith, sweetheart of the farmer's most charming son, and envy of her peers—Galina's life is as close to ideal as it can be. Sinister powers may lurk deep in the forest, where waters run cold and unafraid, but Galina is well-protected; after all, how could anything less than blissful befall someone so good?

Her constant longing for perfection, however, is more dangerous than she knows."

A branching twine game with multiple endings, drawing inspiration from gothic fantasy and Slavic folklore.

name: QUByte Classics: Tinhead
summary: Embark in an adventure to save the stars in Tinhead

name: Quest Hunter: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Quest Hunter is an isometric action-RPG where your choice drives the story. Find tons of treasures and secrets, solve puzzles, equip your character, level up your skills and finish off enemy bosses. Play on the couch, alone or with friends, or make it an online party for up to four players!

Strangewood is a story addition to Quest Hunter. Explore new locations, fight with new enemies, solve puzzles with new mechanics. Level up new skills and get new weapons and equipment.

name: Quickie: A Love Hotel Story
summary: Quickie: A Love Hotel Story is an erotic management dating-sim where you manage a love hotel and develop romantic relationships in the city of Tokyo.

name: Quester Osaka
summary: A dungeon exploration RPG specializing in hack-and-slash. The game is full of challenging elements. There are 32 characters (8 classes), skills to enjoy combos, modifiable armaments, "New Game+" to enjoy playing around, etc.

name: Qualia/Delta
summary: A in-development PC otome game.

name: Quirky Crystal RPG
summary: A short 2-4 hour classically-styled RPG where you investigate the strangeness surrounding the guardian dragon's and their crystals. It also features a fun combat system where effects spontaneously occur based on your equipment set-up.

name: Quick Mafs
summary: Quick Mafs is a game for children to learn how to count from zero to one hundred. Math examples are automatically generated with plus, minus, times and divide. Learn it easy and quickly with colorful and funny game for everybody.

name: QuaQua
summary: QuaQua (that's Aqua, with a Quack!) is the addictive duck game for you. Catch the falling blocks to build terrain and keep as much water on your island as possible. Beware of falling bombs and heavy rain as the difficulty slowly climbs in this tile-matching arcade puzzle adventure.

name: Questprobe featuring The Hulk
summary: Questprobe featuring The Hulk is a graphic adventure video game. It is the first entry in Questprobe, an intended series of graphic adventure games that only released three instalments before the developer's bankruptcy. The game's narrative follows the Marvel superhero Hulk and his human alter-ego Bruce Banner (in their first video game appearance), who must explore the mysterious lair of the Chief Examiner.

name: Queen’s Guard
summary: An action RPG where you protect a princess of a fallen kingdom. Experience gripping swordplay with powerful, heavy strikes, and share a turbulent life on the run with the princess. When an age of chaos and destruction begins, protect the princess of destiny—no matter what!

name: Queens
summary:
Crown each region.

The goal is to have exactly one crown in each row, column, and color region - with no crown touching each other. There is only one right answer, and no guessing is needed.

name: Queen's Crown
summary: Korean action RPG for the iPhone featuring quest-based game play and a graphic style similar to Legend of Zelda games like WindWaker and Minish Cap.

name: Que ~Ancient Leaf no Yousei~
summary:
You are Makoto, a high-school sophomore. One day, you receive a package with a virtual reality gadget that lets you experience a social networking service called Que. It just so happens that service is for girls only. As such, you create your female avatar and enter the world of an Ancient Leaf. While hiding your identity when talking to girls in virtual reality, many of your friends in real world have no idea about you, but at the same time you have an opportunity to find out more about them, things they wouldn't usually share with a guy.

The game is a typical visual novel which consists of reading through the text, which has full voice-over support for NPCs, lets you check the message log, and remove the text to see the clear background image with character sprites. Occasionally, choices are made to branch the story, and you can even select to go to different locations on the city map, both during daytime and nighttime.

According to the project's original concept by Chiyomaru Shikura, the game explores the theme of "Where is the boundary between the digitalized fictional world and the real world?" It is considered to be connected to the science adventure series, including "CHAOS;HEAD" (2008) and "STEINS;GATE" (2009), which further developed this theme.

name: Quetzal
summary: Control a Mesoamerican god who must escape the underworld in this challenging 2D pixel art platformer, dodging dangers to recover the sacred bones of humanity.

name: Quote Codes
summary: Quote Codes is a word puzzle game where you unlock your favorite quotes by substituting one letter at a time. In every game, each symbol stands for a letter. Your aim is to guess and decode the quotes!

name: Quest for Conquest
summary: Gather your troops and embark on a journey! The capital awaits you, but will you have what it takes to survive the journey, or will you fail like many others before you?

name: Quiz Thiz USA: Gold Edition
summary: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Quester
summary: As with many other ball-and-paddle games (including Namco's own Gee Bee trilogy), the player must take control of a paddle at the bottom of the screen, and move it left and right to deflect a ball into the formation of bricks above it (and if you can keep that ball in play for a preset period of time, it will split into three balls) - certain bricks will also leave powerups when destroyed that will increase the size of the paddle, generate several extra balls in force-field when the initial ball goes into it and even create a line below the paddle that will prevent the balls from going out of play when collected. The seventh, fourteenth, twenty-first and twenty-eighth rounds are also "bonus rounds", where you have to destroy all the bricks in the formation within a preset time limit (unless all your balls go out of play); the thirty-third and final round is also a "boss round", where you are up against "Burida" (who is protected by a metal wall with a vulnerable spot on its top side, but does not attack by spitting lethal mirrors like Doh did to both Vaus in Arkanoid and the human Bubblun & Bobblun in Rainbow Islands). Once you have hit that vulnerable spot on the top side of the wall five times, it will leave Burida vulnerable - and once you have hit him, you will receive 100000 points for every life you have left and the game will be over.

name: Quest & Rest: Inn Simulator
summary: Run a cozy fantasy inn where adventurers rest, restock, and head off to glory. Assign quests, serve buff-granting ales, sell magical gear, and manage your guests—then watch their stories unfold from the comfort of your inn.

name: Quest 64
summary: Celtland has been cast into chaos by the theft of Eletale's Book. This mystical volume contains the secrets of the Spirit Tamers. Control Brian, a magician's apprentice, as he explores the expansive countryside and villages on his quest. If he does not reclaim the book, the Kingdom of Celtland will be cast into darkness forever.

name: Quichotte’s Never-Ending Watch: A Lofi Companion
summary: Meet Sir Quichotte, your loyal desktop guardian! Watch this brave knight battle monsters - from skeletons to zombies - while you work, study, or relax. Features Lofi music, Pomodoro timer, to-do lists, memos. It's a cozy idle game that lives anywhere on your desktop.

name: Quiz Show
summary: Quiz Show was an italian TV show aired from october 2000 to january 2002, based on the TV format "It's Your Chance of a Lifetime". The contestants have 512 seconds to anwer 10 questions, each one progressively difficult

name: Quackdzilla: Pool Cleaning Simulator
summary: Feel the specific atmosphere and humor of the Pool Cleaning Simulator. Take on the role of a pool boy and discover what fate awaits you in the free prologue of Pool Cleaning Simulator - Quackdzilla🦆!

name: Questprobe featuring Human Torch and the Thing
summary: Questprobe 3: Fantastic 4 is the third in a text-adventure series featuring Marvel Super Heroes.

name: Quantum Qitty
summary: A game about unstable little qitty.

name: Quirky Forest
summary: Place the correct item at the right place, plan ahead, think carefully, you could say this game is easy to play, but hard to master, be prepared to be challenged!

name: Q.U.B.E. 2: Puzzle Pack 1 - Lost Orbit
summary:
Expand your experience of Q.U.B.E. 2 with Lost Orbit, the DLC Puzzle Pack which gives players access to 10 brand new and exciting puzzle rooms with an additional master puzzle to finish. The DLC is packed with 32 collectibles to discover in hidden areas which changes the flow of play and also presents the player with fresh challenges.

Step aboard the space station for pure-puzzler action and tackle a variety of brain-teasing puzzles, significantly more difficult than the main game. The open game structure allows players to explore the puzzle rooms in whichever order they would like and the collectibles provide additional challenges in each room for hardcore puzzle fans to get stuck into. Fans of the Q.U.B.E. franchise won’t want to miss out on this fantastic piece of DLC!

name: Qusha
summary:
In "Exorcism", a game in the style of Vampire Survivors, you gain experience and currency to strengthen your magical abilities and attributes by slaying massive amounts of demons with your ever increasing magical powers.
It is a course example for an indie game creator class launched by Lao V and Mo Hua and therefore is not particularly long, but free to experience for everyone.

name: Quase Rosa
summary: Quase Rosa is a 2D precision platformer with elements of randomness. With each attempt to beat a level, a different possible skill.

name: QuizUp
summary: QuizUp is a mobile game developed by Iceland-based Plain Vanilla Games. The game is a mobile trivia app similar to the game Trivial Pursuit. QuizUp is a single-player game in which one user competes against another during seven rounds of timed multiple-choice questions of various topics. There are over 680 total categories of topics available to users to choose from and all the questions are voluntarily submitted by content contributors. Most categories are available in different languages.

name: Quiz Quest
summary:
Quiztal Games introduces Quiz Quest: a mind-stretching, collaborative quizcapade!

Team up with friends and family, using your smartphones as your controllers, and put your heads together as you journey to achieve the rank of Master Quizards.

The fallen knight Sir Answerlot needs you to take up his failed quest to rid the kingdom of its most hated tormentor: the evil dragon Spontanius the Combustor. You will need to keep your wits about you as you encounter many allies and enemies, make many crucial decisions and answer many, many quiz questions along the way.

name: Quiver & Die
summary:
Quiver and Die is a medieval top down zombie shooter where you play as an archer in a zombie infested dark fantasy world.

With beautiful, hand drawn art and carefully hand crafted levels, Quiver and Die aims to provide a fun, action-packed and visually stunning gameplay experience.

name: Quickie World
summary:
Quickie World is a ROM hack of Super Mario World created by Valdio. The hack features custom music and custom blocks, but contains no secret exits. Hence the name "Quickie" each level is short, but full of various Kaizo tricks.

A sequel titled Quickie World 2 was released on March 8, 2019.

name: Queen's Domain
summary: A retro-fantasy action RPG with brutal combat and traversal-focused exploration. Embark on a quest to find your father who disappeared on the mysterious Isle of Neasied, where sinister forces gather, secrets hide everywhere, and the sleeping Queen has begun to stir…

name: Quake: Episode 6 - Dimension of the Machine
summary: Dimension of the Machine is a brand new experience created by the MachineGames team. Continue your fight through brand new dimensions, figure out the secret to restarting the machine, and come face to face with an old foe.

name: Quake II: Call of the Machine
summary: A brand-new Quake II experience from MachineGames consisting of 28 campaign levels and one multiplayer deathmatch map. In the depths of Strogg space lies the Machine, a singularity capable of collapsing the fabric of reality. Fight across time and space to find the Strogg-Maker, destroy it, and change the destiny of man and machine.

name: Quake: Episode 5 - Dimension of the Past
summary: An semi-official 5th episode for Quake's 20th Anniversary developed by MachineGames of Wolfenstein New Order/New Colossus fame.

name: Quake II
summary:
This remastered release includes:
- Quake II (original version and enhanced release)
- The N64 version of Quake II
- Quake II Mission Pack: The Reckoning (expansion pack)
- Quake II Mission Pack: Ground Zero (expansion pack)
- A new expansion titled "Call of the Machine" as well as a new multiplayer map
- Multiplayer crossplay between Windows and console versions
- The original, unmodified release of Quake II: Quad Damage
- Concept art, sketches, videos and early, playable levels
- Various improvements such as support for higher resolutions, new gameplay elements and enhanced AI, a compass to show the way to the next objective etc.

This release replaced prior Quake II entries on digital stores upon its release. For previous owners, it was distributed as a free upgrade.

name: Quetzal's Call
summary: Experience the rush of soaring, dashing and leaping with unmatched agility as you navigate intricate levels and test your skills in a vibrant, treacherous world.

name: Quiz Thiz United Kingdom
summary: Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Qualia
summary: Intellica thanks you for volunteering in this short text-based AMT study. Pay attention to the participants answers, and classify them as either Human or Artificial. Remember, think happy!

name: Quest for the Golden Duck
summary: Run around the maze collecting coins while being chased by spooky monsters. Outsmart the enemies in 4-player co-op games, or play the versus mode as a monster to prevent the other team from stealing all the gold from the castle.

name: Quarta Amethyst
summary: When Olicts, a variety of monsters that prey exclusively on humanoids, begin to surge in the region, Quarta Amethyst, a knight of the Quarta Order sworn to defend the innocent from the Olict menace, is tasked with finding the cause, and put a stop to it.

name: Queen Anne's Lace
summary: An anomaly horror game with a big twist: YOU hide the anomalies. As the Night Auditor for the Queen Anne's Lace hotel, your job is to keep your guests checked in. Forever.

name: Quiver Dick's Terrible Tale for Terrible Parents to Read to Their Equally Terrible Children
summary: From the creative minds that brought you Metal as Phuk and The Chronicles of Quiver Dick, Crankage Games brings you another hilarious, boner-inducing tale of epic proportions! Embark on a journey as Mary the Fairy, a cannibalistic, foul-mouthed pixie in an even more foul-mouthed world!

name: Quadphos
summary:
Quadphos is a grid-based rule deduction logic puzzle game.
Each puzzle consists of a grid and several numerical clues. Your goal is to light up the cells to satisfy all the numerical clues.
The symbols next to the numbers represent the specific rules that these clues follow. For example, a number might indicate the number of lit cells within its range.
The game doesn't directly tell you these rules. You'll need to deduce and verify their meanings through a series of levels. As you solve puzzles, you'll continually refine your guesses, or even discard them entirely, until you discover a more exciting perspective.

name: Quake
summary:
Quake is an updated and remastered compilation release of id Software's original Quake for the occasion of its 25th anniversary, including:
- Quake (original version and enhanced update)
- Quake Mission Pack No. I: Scourge of Armagon (expansion)
- Quake Mission Pack No. 2: Dissolution of Eternity (expansion)
- Quake: Episode 5 - Dimensions of the Past (expansion)
- Quake: Dimension of the Machine (an entirely new expansion was developed for this release)

The game also includes community-curated and updated mods as free downloads through their Bethesda.net service (online account and registration required), and includes a port of the Nintendo 64 Quake campaign on launch. The PC version is open to all mods, for the console versions the selection is curated. It features maps that have been slightly altered from the original PC campaign, a special screen filter effect, plus the original soundtrack composed for that release.

The game's multiplayer has also been overhauled, allowing for four player same-screen co-op gameplay or arena versus modes, four player online co-op, or up to eight players versus online through Bethesda.net, which also allows for crossplay between the different platforms. Steam releases of the game also include Quake v1.09, which can be used to play older game campaigns and mods, as well as classic LAN multiplayer.

This version of the game supports additional technical improvements for compatible platforms, such as widescreen support, 4K resolution, enhanced models, dynamic lighting, anti-aliasing, depth of field, and more graphical enhancements. A later released free update for the Xbox Series and PlayStation 5 versions introduces 4K/120fps.

name: Quadralien
summary:
Your mission is tough: Find and destroy the evil Quadraliens who have infested Cybernetic Power Station ASTRA and bring the reactor back under control. You have to work your way through ASTRA's nineteen chambers with only six droids, each with its own special features. The chambers require strategy as well as a fast trigger finger, so take your time and plan your moves.

But don't take too long, the temperature's rising toward a meltdown of cosmic proportions. QUADRALIEN is the hit action/strategy game from Europe, now available in North America. It combines sophisticated arcade action with challenging puzzles for hours el great entertainment.

name: Quarion
summary: A short 2D pixel-style metroidvania where you explore, fight bosses, aquire items and abilities and find secrets. Heavily inspired by games such as You Have to Win the Game and VVVVVV.

name: Queen of the Pack
summary: After being bitten, Farrah is thrust into a world of half-wolves and other creatures she never knew existed. Now she must learn to either embrace her new life as a member of the pack, or remain a human.

name: Queen's Quest 2: Stories of Forgotten Past - Collector's Edition
summary:
When the king asks a famous shapeshifter alchemist to look into the murder of his most trusted Agent and friend the last thing she expected was to discover an intricate network of criminals working from the shadows to bring chaos into the land. At first it seems that the murder was nothing more than a simple crime of hatred and impulse but as she plunges deeper into the investigation the alchemist learns the hard truth, nothing is as it seems and no one can be trusted.

Follow the indulging investigation of a shapeshifter, discover the conspiracy threatening to shake the very foundations of a kingdom and unveil the Stories of Forgotten Past: Queen Quest 2.

This Collector's Edition includes the following extras
- Bonus Chapter
- Game Guide
- Wallpapers
- Concept art
- Music
- Cutscenes
- Hidden objects
- Mini Games
- Characters

name: Quar: Battle for Gate 18
summary: Quar: Battle for Gate 18 is a turn-based strategic VR game set in the grimsical world of Alwyd. The Quar are cute alien ant-eaters. Don't mistake cute for gentle. They use their WW1 level technology to wage war across the face of their world.

name: QUByte Classics: The Humans by Piko
summary:
The Humans are one of the first games of his time to present cooperation within characters to achieve the objectives that is to make sure your tribe will be alive at the end of the day, organization is the key, and pre-plan your time is highly important.

The player controls a group of humans and may switch between any human at any time, in order to complete a level, it is often necessary to use certain tools or abilities, such as stacking to reach a high ledge.

name: Questionable Ethics
summary:
Survivors got stuck in a mysterious research facility.
This campaign is about randomness and some traps.

name: Questionable Ethics: Alpha Test
summary: A 5-map campaign, a sequel to 'Questionable Ethics'.

name: Quake Survivor
summary: Trapped on the tracks with an earthquake threatening your life, you must escape from the subway tunnel and station about to collapse. Must solve the puzzles, avoid, collect things and use the enviroment at your favor. Play alone this First Person Horror puzzle game and try to survive.

name: Quiz & Learn: Geography
summary: A family-friendly, relaxing multiple-choice quiz about geography that includes photo rounds with interesting facts

name: Quacolé Tennis
summary: Face the most unexpected opponents in completely crazy tennis matches. Win tournaments, overcome obstacles, and defeat giant monsters using the power of your racket! Embark on a solo adventure or invite a friend to explore the world of Quacolé Tennis in doubles matches.

name: Queen's Loyalty
summary: Gather monster queens and rebuild your castle. You must take back your power and hold them accountable for not honoring the peace agreement.

name: Quiz Master Zero and the Silky Road
Quietus Euphony
summary: Investigate a bandmate’s mysterious death inside a remote hotel. Search rooms for clues, build trust through conversations, and use musical ciphers to uncover hidden truths in this narrative-driven murder mystery RPG.

name: Queen's Revenge
summary: Queen’s Revenge is a fast-paced tower defense game where you play as a fallen queen, betrayed and cast into darkness. Build defenses by day, fight relentless foes at night, and reclaim your throne. Every action counts—plan, battle, survive!

name: Queen Ant Perfume Episode 0: The Mad Love of Jack the Ripper
summary: A visual novel game set in “London at the end of the 19th century” and “modern Tokyo”. The game depicts a love episode between you and a male suspect that “Watson-kun,” the assistant of a famous detective (you), witnesses while investigating a threatening letter sent by Jack the Ripper.

name: Questing
summary: An oddball, subversive fantasy adventure game inspired by 16-bit classics like Chrono Trigger and A Link to the Past

name: Qual
summary: Qual is a fast paced top-down bullet hell that emphasizes on spell combinations.

name: Queue Simulator
summary: Queue simulator brings you your favorite part of MMORPG experience - waiting in Queue!

name: Quadratic Puzzle 2
summary: Quadratic puzzle 2 is a very interesting puzzle game. Compared with the first one, it has more functions. It can restore images with one click, allowing you to browse pictures faster!

name: Quite a Ride
summary: Pedal through the fog, but never look back.Trapped in a constantly shifting horror, you must ride, conserve your phone's battery, and decode cryptic messages to escape. Explore, survive, uncover the truth.

name: Quatris
summary: Simple rules, surprising results: challenge yourself with a novel twist on a classic.

name: Quartermaster
summary: Yearly, thousands of agents die all around the world, due to gadget malfunctions! Become a manager of a secret laboratory and create the most ingenious inventions you could ever think of. Make sure to deliver the highest quality gear, and shut down your industry competitors. Agents' safety is in your hands!

name: Quake II: Sewer Jam Volume 1
summary: Sewer levels are notoriously hard to get right. That’s why Andrew Yoder set out to challenge the Quake community to come up with good sewer levels all the way back in 2019. We wanted to do the same for the Quake 2 Remaster and that resulted in this package. Featuring nine new maps, a hub level and pre-rendered cutscenes. We hope you enjoy Map-Center’s Quake 2 Sewer Jam Volume 1.

name: Quarth
summary: Quarth is a combination of Tetris-style gameplay and a fixed shooter in the Space Invaders tradition.

name: Quadrofriend
summary: Ethan goes to a psychiatric hospital to visit an old friend. Upon arrival, he discovers that the staff has disappeared and his friend has gone mad. Now, Ethan must endure brutal trials to survive and escape this nightmare.

name: Quake
summary: In addition to support for modern systems and improved rendering techniques, this remastered version includes both mission packs, Scourge of Armagon and Dissolution of Eternity. It also includes two episodes created by MachineGames: the previously-released Dimension of the Past and a new one called Dimension of the Machine.

name: Queens Master
summary:
A puzzle game you can pick up in seconds but won’t stop thinking about all day. Queens Master is quick, clever, and impossible to put down.

The concept is elegant: the board is set into different colored tiles, and your goal is to place one queen in each set. But here’s the challenge—queens don’t share rows, columns, or touch one another. To win, you’ll need to think ahead and make every move count. Double-tap a tile to reveal a queen. Guess correctly, and you’re rewarded. Guess wrong, and you lose a life. With only three lives to spare, every decision matters.

It’s easy to start and hard to stop—perfect for your morning coffee, your commute, or a quick mental break. Queens Master doesn’t demand your attention—it earns it.

name: Quod Init Exit
summary: Everybody has their own philosophy of life. Zampo's is: whatever goes in, comes out. There's no changing your dear friend's mind, so you're by his side in his ravenous quest...

name: Quest: Brian's Journey
summary: Brian lives in a peaceful and quiet town where nothing ever happens, which is the way everyone likes it. Suddenly, hordes of evildoers overrun the town and start wreaking havoc in this once-sleepy community. The town is counting on Brian to go on a quest to restore peace and harmony. You take control of the unlikely hero and set out on the adventure of a lifetime. While traveling, you will discover something more nefarious is happening, and you'll have your hands full of monsters and enemies. Throughout your journey you will have to battle these monsters and enemies in turn-based combat with a twist. The twist is that you can move between turns to dodge attacks, and you can also combine spells and attacks to create special moves. Help Brian save his town, and maybe even the world, in QUEST RPG: Brian's Journey.

name: Quiz! Cat Proverbs Around the World
summary:
A cat cries for a 〇〇!?
Learn Unique Cat Proverbs from Around the World in a Fun Quiz!

name: Quick Step
summary:
Quick Step! is a unique take on the Q*Bert formula by adding two player action and a more frantic pace. You are a kangaroo who loves to paint trampolines green. However, a squirrel likes to paint them blue. Naturally, this can result in some hectic competition between the two. Jumping on one of the trampolines will turn it the color of your character and earn you points. During the game the trampolines scroll down to the bottom of the screen before they disappear. Naturally, you must avoid being on a trampoline when it disappears, otherwise you will lose a life.

Occasionally, you may find a special square that will cause your character to flash. If you jump onto a trampoline where the other character is, they will be stunned briefly, giving you an opportunity to make them lose a life. What is truly unique is how the computer player also has a limited number of lives just like the human player does. After one player loses all of their lives, the other player is awarded extra points for his or her remaining lives. If you want to get big points, you have to adopt a different strategy to avoid having your opponent lose all their lives. Truly a unique and fun experience, although the game can be frustrating to play against the computer as you'll find it easy to stay alive longer than the computer.

name: Quadroids
summary: Quadroids is a mind-twisting pixel-art strategy puzzle platformer that disrupts the genre with a major twist. Players get to clear 100+ hazard-filled interconnected levels by coordinating their minions simultaneously across four screens.

name: Quatro!
summary: Make regrets and lose the rest of your friends in this terrifying card game

name: Quantum of Hope
summary: Quantum of Hope is an action-packed Twin-Stick shooter game set on Earth overrun by aliens. Use your Fabricator and different weapons to shoot your way through alien swarms to rescue mysterious Princess in distress.

name: Quiet is the Eyes
summary: All your coworkers are gone and the halls are quiet, except for the pitter patter of rain on the window. Explore a desolate laboratory as a creature stalks you, always watching. Run and hide as you solve puzzles and learn more about what happened to the facility its secrets.

name: QuickMaze
summary: A simple game of maze, the goal of which is to get the ball to the endpoint. As the player progresses the difficutly increases.

name: Quake: Rubicon
summary: Rubicon was a single tech base level for Quake featuring custom textures and code tweaks, plus a start map and a secret map based on The Legend of Zelda.

name: Quarantine Zone: Border Zombie Checkpoint
summary: Control the border, safeguard countless lives.

name: Quake II: Quad Damage
summary: It's the final culmination... bound and bagged exclusively for you. A quadrisection of explosive gaming that's a true embodiment of the game that annihilates the rest. Quad Damage compiles original Quake II, The Reckoning, Ground Zero, and Extremities all into one solid mass. Perfect for power killing, this lethal gathering levels you with mind-bending AI, merciless monsters, and an arsenal of weaponry. consider this your four-warning.

name: quilt
summary: A Yume Nikki Fangame by rataratata, catcatcat6, nunu and luok.

name: Queen of the Flies
summary: This is a reading game that describes internet life. You can push the plot by clicking on different positions on the screen and pass the customs in 30 minutes.

name: Quiz Express
summary: English grammar is the way in which meanings are encoded into wordings in the English language. This includes the structure of words, phrases, clauses, and sentences, right up to the structure of whole texts. It is important to speak and write grammatically correct English that is universally understood. The motivation behind this quiz app is for you to practice your English grammar regularly while on the go. We believe you can learn better by practicing rather than just studying grammar rules. The quiz is designed such that each session takes no more than a minute to complete thus you can easily find time to play it even while commuting.

name: Quibble Race
summary:
Compete with the computer or your friends to earn the most money in a futuristic alien-horse racing game. Sponsor some of the quibbles or sabotage them to improve your odds.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Quake: Blue Monday Jam
summary:
"Blue"-themed community map pack with 15 mostly small to medium-sized levels including a start map. It comes with a few high-res textures, custom skyboxes, and music tracks. The map sources are included. Each of the maps have a "blue" palette to strands from the usual monotone brown palette of Quake.

Note: These maps require Quoth 2.2 and a source port supporting the -quoth command-line switch. Additionally, for some of these maps, it must have increased limits and/or BSP2 support.
