name: Quake: The Offering
summary: Quake enthusiasts and the uninitiated alike will revel in the ultimate adrenaline fix with the Quake: The Offering game pack. This specially boxed collection features one of the best-selling PC games of all time, Quake, bundled with the two award-winning official id Software Quake Mission Packs -- Scourge of Armagon and Dissolution of Eternity.

name: QuickFire
summary: QuickFire: This Wild West shootout has no skill cooldowns—your speed decides victory.

name: Quake: Ter Shibboleth
summary:
Redux version of the previously-released Ter Shibboleth Part 1 and Part 2, featuring various changes including a port of the first five maps to Drake.

An episode with eight huge, uniquely themed levels: a beach resort under a Golden Gate Bridge, a puzzle map set in an industrial storage facility, an Asian temple, a twisted otherworldly fortress, a desert mining town, a snowy village in the mountains, the city of Paris (complete with Notre Dame and the Eiffel tower), and an ancient Roman city next to a colosseum. Most of the maps use custom textures; the texture wads and the map sources are included.

name: Quest for Glory Collection
summary: The world of Gloriana, with all its wonderful diversity, awaits you.

name: Quickerflak
summary: Quickerflak is an experimental fast-paced time-attack top-down combat retro-hardcore minigame, that can be finished in a minute.

name: Quill & Sword: Fate of Eryndor
summary: A fantasy grand strategy game where you lead any realm you want, manage resources, forge alliances, and command armies across a hand-painted world. Plan, negotiate, and conquer to shape the balance of power in Quill & Sword: Fate of Eryndor.

name: Qume: Echoes of Sand
summary: The world has been buried in dust. For those left behind, the sand is quieter than death. Become one of the survivors in Qume and uncover the secrets hidden behind the silence.

name: Queeny Army
summary: Queeny Army, go arround many levels, fight with the different weapons that you find along the way, use your skills in your favor and defeat the different bosses that you will find your journey through San Romero, liberate your country from a corrupt government, defeating corrupt cops to reach the bosses of the criminal organization comman

name: Quartz Caverns
summary:
Quartz Caverns is an action-adventure puzzle game where you guide the main character through a series of ancient caves in search of mystical crystals. The caverns are filled with tricky puzzles, dangerous slimes, and other hazards that test your wits and reflexes. As you explore, you'll uncover hidden paths, discover powerful relics, and face numerous threats lurking in the shadows. Only the bravest can retrieve the legendary crystals and uncover the secrets of the Quartz Caverns.

Are you up for the challenge?

name: Quantum Theory
summary: Take on a living alien tower that shifts and mutates around you, and the hordes of hostile creatures that dwell within, in this infamous Japanese clone of Gears of War.

name: Quality Control
summary: In this game YOU are the beta tester. Explore the levels. Find the bugs. And fix them !

name: Quiet Thoughts
summary: Quiet Thoughts is a challenging narrative-driven platformer, centered on Asha's journey as she discovers what lies beyond her forest home, and searches for an escape from her own feelings.

name: Quiz Magic Academy 7
summary: The seventh game in the long running Quiz arcade game series by Konami.

name: Quill > Pistol
summary: Thrown into an underground pistol dueling tournament, you'll have to think fast and shoot faster. Quill > Pistol is a turn-based logic dueling game where every shot begins with a puzzle.

name: Quit Today
summary:
"Quit Today" is a side-scrolling action game around the workplace theme.

One usual day, when you step into the company, all the colleagues attack you because they think you want to resign!

To figure out what happened, you start a fighting trip with your briefcase, and realize the company darkness which you ever ignored is so hateful. You can't keep enduring the high-level's behavior, determined to send the resignation challenge to this company formally!

name: Quantum Derelict
summary: Quantum Derelict is a rogue-lite survival horror game set in a chilling Lovecraftian inspired narrative. In the uncharted vastness of space, outwit the sinister cult of VUGSHERYOG and the lurking horrors as you strive to retain your sanity, find rescue, and survive against all odds.

name: Quake II RTX
summary:
This special release of Quake II includes the 3 shareware levels, but with extensively reworked graphics and codebase to make use of Nvidia's ray-tracing technology in their contemporary GeForce RTX 20 series of graphics cards.
Quake II RTX is a cutting-edge, ray-traced reimagining of the old school classic. Global lighting effects, including realistic reflections, refraction, shadows, ambient occlusion and global illumination are a result of the path-traced simulation of light.

name: Quantum Action
summary: Cyberpunk-themed MMO RPG

name: Questwood
summary: Fight, loot, and explore procedurally generated forests, alone or with friends in splitscreen co-op! Play as the Archer, Bomber, Spartan, or Wizard, find powerful weapons, and build a deck of modifier cards. Can you survive the forest and defeat the cursed tree?

name: Quantum Soteriology
summary: 18+ Only Non Fiction Visual Novel. LGBT+ Affirming Christianity. Touhou. True story of decade of abuse faced by autistic plural trans lesbians. Survive suicide attempts, OCD scrupulosity. Keep breathing through deviated nasal septum. Fight fawn freeze and fly fly away Escape this eternal Hell

name: Quiete
summary: A hardcore open-world survival action RPG set during the Eon of the Forbidden Chant, when a great calamity rendered the spoken word unusable. Explore, fight, loot, and survive. Conquer, if you can.

name: Qubes
summary:
Tap to change the direction of the bouncing ball. Collect coins and unlock new balls.

How long can you survive on the qubes?

name: Quiplash
summary: Quiplash is a gut-busting, say-anything, no-rules party game!

name: Quiz & Learn: Food & Drink
summary: A relaxing multiple-choice quiz about food and drink that includes photo rounds with interesting facts

name: Quartet
summary: A series of unlikely train robberies. A mysterious deck of cards. A fleet of deadly airships. An accidental mage. Choose from four stories, in any order, and see how they eventually intertwine in this turn-based RPG.

name: Quiztastic
summary: Become a contestant in one of thousands of quizzes and personality tests or call the shots yourself and write the questions, hire a host and choose a studio and give the world a chance to be in the hot seat of your very own quiz show in Quiztastic!

name: Qualia
summary:
A Psychological-horror RPG. Eileen, a troubled human girl stumbles into an infinite-everchanging abandoned building. She gets lost and meets a new friend: a human-like doll. They search for an exit.

It's a story about friendship, humans and a naive girl separated from all of humanity.

name: Quick! Mom's Home!
summary:
Do your chores, build your empire and don't get grounded! 
 
Your mom is pulling into the driveway! Hurry! Get your chores done before you get yourself grounded! 
Quick! Mom's Home! (QMH) is a simulation tycoon game. 
 
Demo your chores today!

name: Quake: A Roman Wilderness of Pain
summary: An episode consisting of three large levels and a start map by Tronyn and PM. The maps follow an evil metal-Egyptian-flesh texture theme and include many modified and new monsters, new items, and weapons as well as other custom codes (arwop.txt). The episode also features background music inspired by The Doors (can be turned off with "impulse 17") and a hidden fifth difficulty mode. The gameplay is fast and very hard, blending in with the strong 'Doom vibe' it conveys - especially the boss battle is extremely tough.

name: Quijote: Quest for Glory
summary: Quijote: Quest for Glory is a tactical card strategy game based on the work of Miguel de Cervantes. Lead Don Quixote on his heroic journey and experience some of the most familiar episodes of the classic novel published in the 17th century.

name: Quarantine Zombies
summary: Inspect survivors in Chicago's Quarantine Zone to spot the infected before they turn. No base-building - just tense inspections and gunfights! You've got 30 days until the army arrives. Hold out, fix your car, and fight your way through Chicago to the main checkpoint to save your little brother.

name: QuantumPulse 2A
summary: Solve programming puzzles on a fictional computer with radio-based communication and unique limitations. Competitively optimize to compete on leaderboards against friends and the global community.

name: Queen Beast
summary:
Humble miller Otto's quiet days are thrown into chaos when he emerges from his bed one morning to discover his sister Bronwyn has been kidnapped!

The person responsible is a mysterious knight in dark armor; the only clue he left behind is a bag of gold coins bearing the profile of an unknown woman.

Joining forces with the beautiful and enigmatic adventurer Switch, and the mischievous fairy Echo, our hero sets out on a journey through the forgotten places of his native land in search of the dark knight and the sinister forces that power him. But on his way, Otto will discover much more than he anticipated in this story of romance, non-stop action and adventure!

name: QUByte Classics: Beat 'Em Up Archives
summary: Unleash Your Inner Fighter in Beat 'Em Up Archives: Iron Commando and Legend. Experience Classic Brawling Action in Two Timeless Games from the 90s!

name: Quest for Yrolg
summary:
Deep within his dungeon, Yrolg the Necromancer is summoning a mighty demon to conquer the World. Three brave adventurers, a warrior, a rogue and a sorceress, come to his lair to disrupt this dark ritual. Your job is to stop them! 
 
Should the heroes succeed, your Master will be slain, his reign of terror ended, and the world shall be covered with flowers and puppy dogs. That must never happen - this time, evil shall prevail!

name: Quadle
summary: A brand new arcade puzzler from Gamesare Studios, Envoking the memory of classic arcade cabinet games but adding a new twist. Jump on the blocks as the titular character Quadle, changing the block colors till they are red. Once red they fall away. Eliminate all blocks on the screen to go to the next level. Be careful not to corner yourself into a situation where you can jump to the next block.

name: Quantum Entanglement
summary:
Marine Dorner (that's what she signs her checks at least) has been working at the Odessa underground hyper-science facility for three years.

As a janitor.

She couldn't tell you more than that, having just woken up from one of the facility's regularly mandated memory treatments. She has friends here (even if she can't remember all of them yet.) She has an aptly-named roommate, Gabby, who it turns out has been "more than a roommate" at times in-between these treatments.

And yet, despite all the closed doors and lockdowns, the facility seems safe. Comfortable, even. Until Marine wakes up to find everything's gone...very wrong.

What happened to everyone? What was the facility researching?

There are some doors only a janitor can open.

...And some that no one should...

name: Quaver
summary: Quaver is a community-driven and open-source competitive rhythm game with two game modes and online leaderboards. Create your own maps or challenge the world in online multiplayer matches.

name: Queen's Quest 3: The End of Dawn
summary: In Queen's Quest 3: The End of Dawn you will follow Eliana as she tries to become a true alchemist. You will need to help her solve riddles, explore kingdoms and much more. Follow Eliana on her mission to save her hometown and help her to save the people she loves. Tackle the evil forces behind a deadly betrayal and prove yourself to be a true alchemist.

name: Quadrant
summary: The year is 1979. A secret, final lunar mission has retrieved hundreds of moon rocks for study at Aether Research Facility. Overtaken by curiosity, researchers delve deeper and deeper into the unknown. Only to find a sinister and unperceivable

name: Quarry Truck Simulator
summary: You think you know everything there is to know about driving? Quarry Truck Simulator will make you think again, as it puts you into shoes of a mine worker. You will drive the biggest, most demanding vehicles known to men. They're heavy, they're powerful, they can hold their own in the most uninviting terrain!

name: Quiz Magic Academy 6
summary: The sixth game in the long running Quiz arcade game series from Konami

name: Quarantine Circular
summary:
Quarantine Circular is an experimental short text-based game
A group of scientists interrogate an alien discovered at the heart of a global pandemic. Work with your team, make decisions and uncover the alien's true intentions.

name: Quad Puzzler
summary: Can you build the perfect off-road track? Design the tracks the smart way in this SmartGames adventure!

name: Quark
summary: Quark is a fully modular Minecraft mod, named after the subatomic particle. In simpler terms, it's a large mod with lots of small features, aimed at improving the vanilla game.

name: Quantum Conundrum
summary: In Quantum Conundrum, players take on the role of a young kid dropped off on his uncle's doorstep for the weekend; his uncle just so happens to be the brilliant, eccentric inventor, Professor Fitz Quadwrangle. Upon entering the Professor's vast manor home retrofitted with crazy technology to test his latest hypotheses, players quickly realize their uncle has gone missing. Fortunately, players soon gain access to Professor Quadwrangle's latest invention, the Inter-Dimensional Shift Device, which, at the press of a button, will shift the world around them to an entirely new dimension. In order to find him, players must use the newly found IDS Device to dynamically change the world to and from a variety of different dimensions to progress through the complicated Quadwrangle Manor. While on the journey, becoming adept at utilizing the various dimensions will help them trek from one bizarre and challenging room to the next. It might sound easy enough, but it is a tall order for a kid in a giant puzzle of a manor!

name: Quantum: Recharged
summary: Dodge and encircle your enemies in this neon-drenched revival of the one-of-a-kind arcade classic!

name: Quartet
summary:
A platform shoot-em-up hybrid from Sega for one to four players, selected from either Joe (yellow), Mary (red), Lee (blue) and Edgar (green). The action takes place over a number of sideways scrolling levels, the bulk of which consist of straightforward platform action. On some levels, however, there are jet packs for the players to collect, and the gameplay's emphasis switched to that of a standard, sideways scrolling shoot-em-up.

The object of the game is to destroy an army of robots that have taken over an Earth colony satellite station. Each level has a boss character that must be destroyed. Upon its death it releases a door key that must be used to exit the level. Weapon and character power-ups can be collected to aid players in their task.

Due to its potential for four-player shoot-em-up gameplay, Quartet's gameplay feels vaguely similar to (though by no means as accomplished as) Atari's 1985 classic, "Gauntlet".

name: Quiet as a Stone
summary:
Remake the world in this minimalistic slow game for casual creators. 
Discover a long lost history. 
Create your own scenes. 
Explore atmospheric countryside vignettes. 
Relaxing ambient soundscapes with satisfying interactions. 
Extensive photography mode. 
Embrace impermanence.

name: Quake Champions: Doom Edition
summary:
Sometimes the world doesn't need another hero. It needs a monster.
QC: Doom Edition is a mod that brings the weapons from Quake Champions into Doom, in pixelated flavor. More than just weapons, it also brings the "Champions" mechanic -- different player classes, each one with unique status, speed, active and passive abilities.

name: Quit Your Job! Become A VTuber Fanartist!
summary:
A stat-raising game about quitting your job and becoming a VTuber fanartist.

Wait, what do you mean we've said that already!?

You have 30 days and a dream (and an oshi you can't disappoint)!

What skills will you train to reach your goals?

name: Quest Braintainment
summary: A quiz based on the Dutch magazine of the same name.

name: Quaso Studio: The Liven Collection
summary: Quaso Studio: The Liven Collection is a compilation of two horror games: The To-Do List: Complete tasks, face the killer, escape. Rouge Carmin: Explore the depths of your subconscious, confront your regrets, and find a way out.

name: Quake Rally
summary: Quake Rally is an attempt to turn Quake into a fully fledged Rally game.

name: Quake Champions
summary: The fast, skill-based arena-style competition that turned the original Quake games into multiplayer legends is making a return with Quake Champions.

name: Question Mark 2
summary: Question Mark 2 is a first/third person game, where you can walk, run, jump and interact with objects and mechanisms to solve puzzles. With new items and more enemies. The game has a HUB level that unlocks new levels, similar to Turok Dinosaur Hunter.

name: Quantum Resonance
summary: In Quantum Clove, science has crossed every limit and opened doors to another world—letting unimaginable horrors through. Alone and unaided, you must find a way to escape the underground complex… before it's too late.

name: Quaint
summary: Quentin “Q” Hawthorne is a coffee-loving IT specialist living a quiet life in the small town of Millbrook. But he’s about to learn that this charming place holds a secret – it is home to a 200-years old mage association known as the Snake and Saber Society. Invited to join their ranks, he’ll now have to redefine his understanding of the world. But each step he takes on this new promising path will also bring him closer to his troubled past. Will he be able to confront it? Or will the shackles of guilt stop him from ever moving on?

name: Quiz Brain Workout
summary: A daily challenge for puzzle lovers. Carefully curated quizzes inspired by Japanese logic and culture. From IQ tests to tricky riddles, it’s time to train your brain. Perfect for all ages — sharpen your thinking and enjoy every “aha!” moment.

name: Quiz RPG: The World of Mystic Wiz
summary: An RPG released on iOS and Android devices, the game is in fantasy theme with role playing puzzle genre.

name: Quest 64 "French Vanilla"
summary: Quest 64 “French Vanilla” is a quality-of-life overhaul for Quest 64, that came out of game improvements as part of the Quest 64 Randomizer project “MERROW”. Players requested a QoL ruleset separate (but compatible with) the randomizer ruleset. This patch contains only those QoL options.

name: Quadrata
summary: Quadrata is a minimalist logic puzzle where you control two different characters with the same keys on either side and collect diamonds with a limited number of moves to finish.

name: Queen's Garden: French Splendor - Collector's Edition
summary: Aid Marigold and Florian in their efforts to bring these plants to life!

name: Queen's Revolution: The Romance in Upheavals
summary: Romance game for girls. You, a high school student, become a worthless queen with zero magic ability. When the turbulence of Magic Empire inevitably comes, you decide to take up your last resort, a weapon named "science".

name: Quest for Runia
summary: Quest for Runia is a relaxing VR puzzle game. You have to break 3D structures by combining at least three cubes of the same color. Try to figure out the most effective way to finish each level.

name: Quarantine Area: Zombie Lockdown
summary: Pick Right, or Get Bit.

name: Quad Hopping
summary: The simplest puzzle game is the reaction and the ability to make quick decisions. As we move, we score points and the game gradually accelerates, it is already harder to catch up on the cherished platform to jump even further, to a greater result.

name: Quick, Quack!
summary: Quack Quack Quack Quack!

name: Quest 64: Hard Mode
summary:
Quest64 Hard Mode at it’s core is a difficulty mod of the original story that ended up getting many more changes beyond just difficulty.

A shortlist of most notable features would be
- UI Hud is always visible.
- Stat Growth and Stat Caps are changed.
- All Monster stats are modified (Most cases being 1.5X rounded up).
- Some Monsters were given specific tweaks to make them much harder than the average.
- All “Spirits” are in new locations.
- Some Treasure Chests have had their contents altered.
- Many spells altered, Rebalancing, Deleted, some New Spells entirely.
- Each “Element” is more closely balanced, so that players don’t feel forced to go Earth/Water.
- Item Effects changed
- 6 New “Items” added (2 of them have a default Icon of “White Wings” as I’m not a sprite artist)
- Unused BGM’s have been used in certain areas.
- The Start of leaving the Monastery is faster.
- Mammon’s World Changed Slightly.
- And more…

name: QuackShot Starring Donald Duck
summary:
QuackShot starring Donald Duck is a steady Disney run-and-jump platformer, with a little puzzle-solving element. Characters are mostly based on Disney's cartoon series Duck Tales.

Donald and his three nephews get their hands on a treasure map and set out to hunt the big prize. Donald travels throughout the world, to places like Egypt, India, South Pole, and even Transylvania, while his nephews fly an airplane.

As a weapon Donald uses plungers that can freeze the enemies or stick to walls which can then be used for climbing. Other wacky weapons are popcorn and bubblegum.

name: Quack Jump
summary:
Jump! Yes, every time you jump there is an action and you activate the puzzles,
Get the key and pass the levels by timing the puzzles correctly with good timing!

name: Quest Master
summary: Quest Master is a dungeon maker inspired by the classics that first made us love dungeon crawling. Unleash your imagination, alone or in local co-op, to make dungeons full of puzzles, traps and monsters. Upload them for others to explore and challenge yourself with other players’ creations.

name: Quiz no Hoshi
summary: Quiz no Hoshi is a trivia game with several gameplay modes; the main one is called "Heart of Stone" and is a story-driven series of quiz encounters with strategy board game elements. The plot involves a kidnapping of a little girl by the mafia, and the attempts of a boy named Hoshimaru to rescue her, all the while escaping from an impending apocalypse.

name: Quickboy
summary:
In the not so distant future the world is filled with zombies and most of humanity is too scared to step outside. However, an elite, but jovial mail delivery squad known as Quickboy Inc., delivers packages of comfort and hope to people seeking brighter days. Help Quickboy Inc. traverse through treacherous environments and zombie-filled cities to make the world a better place, one package at a time.

Be prepared for a steampunk-themed, side-scrolling action game where Quickboys deliver packages to city-dwellers by flirting and out-running danger with every jump, run, and slide. Parkour over steep cliffs, slide under narrow crevices, and save your friends from zombies using agility, speed, and high-tech drones and jetpacks to deliver hope to humanity.

name: Queen of the Otaku: There can be Only One
summary: A short visual novel about a manga club torn between its two competing princesses.

name: Quadratic Puzzle 1
summary:
"Quadratic puzzle 1" is a beautiful girl puzzle game developed by "Rabbit studio". The biggest feature of the game is that all the spliced pieces are irregular in shape, just like the puzzles sold in the toy store.

The gameplay is mainly jigsaw puzzles, and you can pass the level by moving all the animation image fragments to their original positions.

name: Quarter Five
summary: QUARTER FIVE is a linear, 15-30 minute game about Artificial Intelligence taking jobs and the eerie reality of working in a corporate office. In each stage, find the hidden anomalies before time runs out to impress your boss!

name: Quake II
summary: You are humanity's last hope to stop the Strogg, a hostile alien race waging war against Earth. Play this military sci-fi FPS, now upgraded for modern platforms with improved visuals, new campaign content, online multiplayer/co-op, and more.

name: Quester
summary: Quester is a role-playing game for PC, released by Thousand Games on 2023. Kazushi Hagiwara was deeply involved in the production and based on his suggestions, it was produced by Thousand Games. It's an indie game and includes hack and slash.

name: Quest for the Code
summary: STARBRIGHT Asthma CD-ROM Game: Quest for the Code is an interactive asthma adventure game developed by Starbright.

name: Q.U.B.E. 2: Puzzle Pack 2 - Aftermath
summary:
Return to the decayed area for pure-puzzler action in Aftermath, the second DLC Puzzle Pack which offers fans 12 challenging new puzzle rooms and showcases brand new mechanics such as the lasers from the original Q.U.B.E. There are a staggering 42 hidden collectibles across the map to locate and an additional master puzzle which builds and transforms with your progress.

The open game structure lets players tackle the puzzle rooms of their choosing and the collectibles provide additional challenges for hardcore puzzle fans to get stuck into.

name: Quail Crossing
summary: Cross hectic roads, dodge vehicles, and hatch eggs! Quail Crossing is a challenging, emotional rollercoaster where you step into the daring life of a quail and guide your bevy of hatchlings to safety. Earn high scores and unlock the latest in quail fashion!

name: Quick Whiskers
summary: Get ready to jump, dash, and glide with Quick Whiskers, a pixel-art platformer where every move counts! Take control of a nimble cat and venture through 30 challenging levels across two unique biomes: the peaceful park and the bustling city. Your mission is simple but full of action: collect food cans and reach a cozy bed to rest.

name: Qurantine Zone
summary: Command the last blockade, inspect survivors, and decide their fate: trust, quarantine, or liquidate. Expand your base, upgrade defences, and fend off hordes. Every step shapes humanity’s survival. Your choice matters and every mistake costs a life...

name: Quake Brutalist Jam III
summary: Quake Brutalist Jam III is a megalithic community project more than a year in the making. It features an entirely new arsenal, a set of new monsters, new powerups, and a complete visual overhaul of Quake's existing roster. The community came out in force, producing an unprecedented 77 maps, pushing the limits of the Quake engine to bring the oppressive, gritty, and beautiful aesthetic of brutalism to life.

name: Qualatro
summary: A SiIvaGunner themed mod for Balatro.

name: Quiz Thiz Spain
summary: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Quartermaster
summary: An online PvE co-op action game for up to 4 players. Work together with your team to manage your inventory, complete objectives, and destroy endless waves of ferocious robots.

name: Quake: Prelude to Apocalypse & Mordrigor's Demise
summary:
Prelude to Apocalypse (most commonly known as mexx8) was an extensive two-map wizmetal medieval map pack, with tense gameplay. While a little dated or "blocky" by modern standard, used the cutscene engine that first debuted in "Vision of Hatred", this time, the cutscenes have been used in moderation in a way that doesn't break immersion. The maps used custom models and sounds, a rare occurrence in 1997.

Another of Marcus Dromowicz's (mexx) very early works, and one of his most notable ones.

name: Quake II
summary: Quake II is a first-person shooter video game developed by id Software and published by Activision. It is not a direct sequel to Quake, id decided to revert to an existing trademark when they were unable to agree on a new name that did not violate another company's trademark.

name: Q-Up
summary: Sick of long queues, unfair matchups, and arbitrary reflex tests? Try Q-UP, the coin flipping eSport. It's one part clicker, one part multiplayer strategy game, one part demented capitalism simulator, and 100% completely random.

name: Quantum League
summary: Quantum League is the first competitive arena shooter that injects a unique time travel mechanic into the tactical way you play the game. When the timer runs out, a 'time loop' feature revives & rewinds you, but THIS time, you get to team up with your own clones with paradoxical results!

name: Quiz Nana-iro Dreams
summary: An Arcade quiz/dating game developed by Capcom that was later ported to the Sony PlayStation and Sega Saturn.

name: Q.U.B.E. 2
summary: Q.U.B.E. 2 is the sequel to the hit first-person puzzle game Q.U.B.E. You are Amelia Cross, a stranded archaeologist who has awoken among the ruins of an ancient alien landscape. With the distant help of another survivor you must manipulate the structure of this mysterious world and find a way back home.

name: Quick Draw
summary: Quick Draw is a single screen two player shooter where each player stands on either side of the screen as cowboys, and have to try to shoot the other player dead. Both players can move up or down, and in between on the screen are cactus and a wagon that scrolls up the screen. The winner is the player who shoots the other player dead five times.

name: Quanero 2 - System Release
summary: Imagine you are a detective in the future, with the best surveillance system ever developed. You can reconstruct crime scenes in virtual reality, move freely and manipulate the time to carry out your investigations.

name: Q.U.B.E. 2: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition gives players access to all released content including Q.U.B.E. 2 Main Game and the Season Pass (Two Puzzles Pack, Original Soundtrack and Glove Skin).

name: Questron II
summary: Questron II a 1988 role-playing video game published by Strategic Simulations for the Apple II, Apple IIGS, Atari ST, Commodore 64, IBM PC, and Amiga. It is the sequel to 1984's Questron. Questron II is credited to Westwood Associates in the instruction booklet for the IBM PC version.

name: Quake: Penumbra of Domination
summary:
An episode with four varied, medium to large Wizard maps, as well as a start map. Also features some modified progs, like rotation, breaking walls, and cutscenes.

Made by mexx (Marcus Dromowicz), the earliest "big name" in the Quake modding scene back in 1996 (not even one year past its release). Penumbra of Domination is considered by many to be mexx's finest work and is one of the few early Quake maps which stood the test of time, using limited tools.

Map packs were rare back then, and having more than two maps was considered out-of-the-ordinary.

name: QuattroMan
summary: You are a boy who steps into an alleyway. Gradually you notice something strange about this place. Escape from the monsters and reach the truth...!

name: QuattroMan
summary: You are a boy who steps into an alleyway. Gradually you notice something strange about this place. Escape from the monsters and reach the truth...!

name: Questerium: Sinister Trinity HD - Collector's Edition
summary: Financed by the banker, the professor builds an evil machine that causes the meteor's energy to spin out of control, destroying the city and mutating its plants and animals. Citizens are evacuated, but rescuers fail to find and evacuate two children. In Questerium: Sinister Trinity HD, you play the investigator hired to work the case, and it's up to you to destroy the evil machine, rescue the abandoned children, save the city and arrest the professor!

name: Quack Attack
summary: Join the Cubic Chaos! Get ready for a wild ride in this 4v4 FPS arena on a cube planet. Choose your animal, collect ducks, and let limbs fly in this cartoon mayhem. With collectible weapons, multiplayer and voice chat, it's a fun carnage at its finest!

name: Quadrapong
summary:
Quadrapong is a four-player version of Pong by Atari Inc. subsidiary Kee Games, and designed by Steve Bristow.

Quadrapong was the first cocktail cabinet arcade video game. The cabinet consists of a woodgrain 35" x 37" cocktail cabinet. Two control paddles are mounted on each side of the cabinet, with a horizontally mounted Zenith television diagonally set in the cabinet.

Two, three, or four players move their paddles to defend their goal area, consisting of openings in the players' walls. Each player starts with four points, and loses one point each time the ball penetrates their goal. If all four points are lost the player's paddle is removed and the goal "closes", creating a solid wall and removing the player from the game. The game continues until only one player is left.

name: Quantum Phantom Basketball
summary: Quantum Phantom Basketball is a basketball-fighting game set in a cataclysmic high fantasy New York City.

name: Quarantine Area
summary: Trust your instincts. The future depends on it.

name: Quest for Cathay Kingdom Mah Jong
summary: Quest for Cathay Kingdom is a solitaire Mah Jong game. It uses combinations of Mah Jong board game with puzzle match-3, bets and wildcards. This gameplay can be enjoyed separately, or within an engaging story with a rich narrative based on historical facts.

name: Quantum Replica
summary:
Hide in time as you explore a sealed off cyberpunk metropolis in Quantum Replica, a mix of fast-paced stealth and metroidvania.
In Quantum Replica, you are an unregistered entity who has managed to enter the cyberpunk heart of this sprawling megacity. Immediately made Most Wanted by its security forces, your urge to explore the city in search of answers will be far from easy. With nowhere to hide, your only refuge is time itself.

name: Quake III: Revolution
summary: Quake III Revolution features several elements adopted from Team Arena, along with a more mission-based single-player mode. It features split-screen multiplayer for up to 4 players, but lacks online play.

name: QUByte Classics: Gourmet Warriors
summary: Save the city from demonic mutant robots attempting to take over!

name: Quest Room
summary: The main goal of the quest is to get out of the room, and for this you need to solve riddles and find hidden clues.

name: Quiz Kingdom: Elementary Math Kids RPG
summary: Learning math has never been this thrilling! Slash monsters while looking your best in stylish, badass outfits. Navigate labyrinths, defeat monsters, conquer mighty bosses — all while tackling 2nd-3rd grade math quizzes right in the heat of battle.

name: Quantum Curse
summary: It's you against the evil crystal corruption in the thrilling battle of Quantum Curse!

name: QuizzLingo
summary: QuizzLingo is a language exchange app in the form of a multiple choice quiz game. Play with real people, learn language, learn knowledge, laugh & have fun! Beta release is English/Vietnamese, with more languages and features in the pipeline.

name: Quadulo
summary: Connecting blocks of the same color creates an island. Building all islands solves the puzzle. Challenging block puzzle game - easy to learn, hard to master, and endlessly satisfying!

name: Quiz Magic Academy 4
summary: The fourth game in the long running Quiz arcade game series by Konami.

name: Quantum Break
summary:
Fix Time Before It Destroys Everything!

When time breaks, catastrophe becomes your playground. As hero Jack Joyce, you'll fight your way through epic disasters that stutter back and forth in time. But surviving this unstable world--and halting the end of time itself--is only possible by mastering your new time powers.

name: Quell Memento
summary: An enchanting puzzle game of logic and relaxation.

name: Quadrium
summary: Quadrium is a fiddly match-3 game. Clear the board by dropping the tiles off the edges. Various bonuses like boxes, glass, fog, static tiles and portals add variety to the gameplay. Juicy and soft graphics, relaxing music and no time limit allow you to enjoy the innovative gameplay.

name: Quake Live
summary: From the legendary series that founded the online shooter genre comes the most exciting, energetic, and fast-paced shooter on the Internet. Play against players around the world in over 100 arenas, and a dozen game modes, in one of the most competitive shooters online today. Welcome to Quake Live.

name: Quasimorph
summary: Take on a role of a hardened PMC fighter in a dark turn-based extraction RPG. Engage in unforgiving combat, manage your ship and pile up the bodies of your clones to unravel the dark mystery behind threat to all life.

name: Quell Zen
summary: Quell Zen - the very embodiment of relaxing logic games - features over 200 beautifully crafted challenges.

name: Quest of Legend
summary: Single player adventure game in third person mode. Mild puzzle solving elements shroud a world in imminent danger! Explore the world, collect ingredients, and weapons to arm yourself against many odd foes. Find one of many ways to save the world!

name: Queen of Moths
summary: It's a winter night. You are coming home by train. You have to change trains at a small train station in the middle of the forest.It's not the first time you've traveled this route. But now you feel like something is different. As if something was watching you.

name: Quest of Vidhuraa
summary: Hard Platformer Game? No. Very Hard Platformer Game.

name: Quest For The X
summary: A retro, story-driven adventure set amidst the medieval intrigue of the Knights Templar.

name: Quantum Quartz
summary: Steampunk pixel-art precision platformer where you toggle platforms on and off using colored crystals. With only one active at a time, each grants a different movement ability, changing how you move and how the level works, blending high-skill platforming with spatial puzzles!

name: Quake
summary: Quake is a first-person shooter video game, developed by id Software and published by GT Interactive in 1996 and featured music composed by Trent Reznor and Nine Inch Nails. It is the first game in the popular Quake series. In the game, players must find their way through various maze-like, medieval environments while battling a variety of monsters using a wide array of weapons.

name: Quilts and Cats of Calico
summary: Quilts & Cats of Calico is a wholesome, award-winning complex puzzle game for 1 to 4 players. Meet adorable cats and sew the coziest quilts. Compete with other players in multiplayer mode, play solo, or delve into the story of a quilter sewing their way through the city of cats.

name: Quantum Suicide
summary:
Quantum Suicide is a game of betrayal, deception and romance in the cold depths of space.

This science fiction thriller visual novel tells the tale of an intergenerational mission and its diverse crew, fighting against a deadly AI (and each other) for the chance to survive. Strategy, love interests and quantum mechanics await you. Your choices change the fate of everyone in Quantum Suicide. You play as a researcher aboard a spaceship on an epic mission to find humanity a new home. The mission is jeopardized by a corrupted A.I system that forces you to play "The Deletion Game", a weekly game where you must battle your crew mates for survival. Prepare to make both friends and enemies of your crew members as you play through rounds of "The Deletion Game".

Can you see the Everett's mission through to the end...alive?

name: Quantic Pinball
summary:
Quantic Pinball, one of the most addictive pinball game ever seen!
Enjoy the feeling of pinball through hours of gameplay.

name: Quod: Episode 1
summary: "Quod" unfolds in a 1930s Texas prison. The main character must escape and uncover the truth. Brace yourself for eerie occurrences and solve intricate puzzles to unveil the terrifying secrets of this place.

name: Quantum Threshold
summary:
Become the Revolution – From a Cyberpunk Wheelchair.
Game Description: In a dystopian cyberpunk hellscape ruled by rogue AI "Techno Wraiths," you’re no underdog—you’re a wheelchair-bound war machine rewriting the rules of survival. Quantum Threshold thrusts you into relentless, ever-shifting arenas where every run is a fight for upgrades, dominance, and escape. Built from the ground up for seated VR, this isn’t just accessibility—it’s a revolution in motion.

name: Quadrivium: Paths of History
summary: In an innovative 2.5D puzzle game, the Quadrivium Project will transport you into a simulation where you will relive the past while solving puzzles and correcting the errors that threaten the world's historical memory.

name: Quest For Wartorn Brotherhood
summary: A story of a young man that wanted to be a part of something, to have a place in this world. Follow Crowly in his adventure as he joins the Brotherhood of Wartorn. Will he be able to lift the curse that demons cast upon earth it's up to you.

name: QuiVr
summary: QuiVr is the defining archery experience, made from the ground up for Virtual Reality. Grab your bow, arrows, and some friends to fight the enemy onslaught.

name: Queen's Quest 4: Sacred Truce
summary:
Restore peace in the realm of the Five Kingdoms!

The realm of the Five Kingdoms faces a formidable challenge. A mysterious power is trying to destroy the relationship between humans and elves and start a conflict.

name: Quake III Arena
summary: Welcome to the Arena, where high-ranking warriors are transformed into spineless mush. Abandoning every ounce of common sense and any trace of doubt, you lunge onto a stage of harrowing landscapes and veiled abysses. Your new environment rejects you with lava pits and atmospheric hazards as legions of foes surround you, testing the gut reaction that brought you here in the first place. Your new mantra: Fight or be finished.

name: Quiz Pro!: General Knowledge
summary: Train your brain and improve your IQ today being playing this fun general knowledge quiz! How smart are you? Learn some new facts today! No matter if you’re alone or playing with friends or family, you’ll will have a lot of fun with this QUIZ game!

name: Queen's Tales: Sins of the Past - Collector's Edition
summary:
In this hidden object game, your enemy imprisoned your father, but now he’s forcing you to marry him! Can you escape and save your father? Can you escape the Elven King and free your father? But don't be too quick to judge, for at the heart of this war lies a dark secret, one that is buried deep within your own past. You must unravel this mystery and unmask the true villain, before it is too late!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Help the Mage in the bonus game!
- View your achievements and collections!
- Get soundtracks, screensavers, and concept art
- Use the available Strategy Guide

name: Quell
summary: An enchanting game of logic and relaxation.

name: Quake 4
summary: Quake 4 is a action shooter game which serves as the another chapter in the Quake series.

name: Quiplash 2 Interlashional
summary: The "say anything" party game is going international! All the hilarious content from Quiplash 2, now in French, Italian, German, and Spanish! With 100 new prompts in each language! (And you can still play in boring old English.)

name: Q.U.B.E: Director's Cut
summary: Q.U.B.E: Director's Cut is the definitive version of the brain-twisting first-person puzzler. Using special high-tech gloves to manipulate cubes in the environment, the player solves an array of conundrums - from physics-based challenges; to 3D jigsaws; to platform-based trials.

name: Quake III: Team Arena
summary: Never before have the forces aligned. United by name and by cause, The Fallen, Pagans, Crusaders, Intruders, and Stroggs must channel their power into an allied operation where teamwork is the only method of mass destruction. Four distinct games test each troop's synthesis and strength to exacting degrees. Cooperation is the only course of action, and war, the only alternative. Soldiers once alone in their struggle, now face the Arena as one.

name: Quadrilateral Cowboy
summary: Quadrilateral Cowboy is a single-player adventure in a cyberpunk world. Tread lightly through security systems with your hacking deck and grey-market equipment. With top-of-the-line hardware like this, it means just one thing: you answer only to the highest bidder.

name: Quest of Dungeons
summary:
By playing as either a Warrior, a Wizard, a Assassin or a Shaman you have to traverse dungeons, defeat enemies and loot everything you can in order to survive. You can learn new skills in Tomes you find along the way and buy/sell items at shops.
The entire game is procedural so you won't find items/enemies in the same place each time you play.

name: Question Cube
summary: Question Cube is a fast, fun quiz game for people who like to be right.

name: Quell the Disaster
summary: This is a 2D pixel horizontal board through the game, through the mouse and keyboard operation. Gain money by destroying monsters and strengthen your abilities; You can acquire additional weapons for special attacks. Players use maneuvers and their favorite extras to help them through the level.

name: Quiz Magic Academy DS: Futatsu no Jikuu Koku
Quarter Monkey
summary: Quarter Monkey or "Rob3 Erd", The well-known Egyptian traditional game revamped to suit all of us.

name: Quarth
summary: MSX port of Block Hole.

name: Quake Condensed
summary: Mini episode consisting of five small polished-up speedmaps, each following one of Quake's native texture themes.

name: Qui Domi
summary: Fight monsters under the bed.

name: Quixzel Rush: Christmas Helper
summary: Quixzel Rush Christmas Helper brings fun and excitement to casual arcade gamers. Crash through cookies, collect heals, and maximize the time you can survive in this high score arcade game.

name: Queen's Tales: Sins of the Past HD
Quack Invasion
summary: Pilot mechs as you slaughter hordes of a diverse cast of alien ducks. Build your arsenal from a variety of mechs, weapons and items to survive in ever-changing scenarios.

name: Quick, Draw!
summary:
Can a neural network learn to recognize doodling?
Help teach it by adding your drawings to the world’s largest doodling data set, shared publicly to help with machine learning research.

name: Quatro!: This is fine DLC
summary: Heat Up With the Quatro! This is fine DLC

name: Quest of Graal DX
summary: Racing platformer with splitscreen multiplayer

name: Quantum Rail
summary: Quantum Rail is a thrilling, fast-paced first-person shooter that takes you on an exciting adventure through a sci-fi-themed wild west world.

name: Quirk! Origins: A Jester's Tale
summary: Jesters want nothing more than to make people laugh and one day be accepted in a Court. Help Jester piece together an awesome show of tricks and pranks in hopes of wooing the four royals of Playcardia. Will Jester achieve the heights of his dreams, or will his jokes simply fall flat?

name: Queen Elsa and Her Horse Girl Games
Quasar
summary: As species, we always needed a story to believe in, we need a hero to prevail, we need a challenge we can overcome, we need a tragedy to make us one.

name: Quién Habla
summary: Multiplayer game about guessing celebrity voices.

name: Quadropus Rampage
summary: Be a Quadropus. Go on a Rampage. Destroy the evil god of the sea before his army of abyssal creatures can bring Woanope to PROBABLE DOOM.

name: Quarantine Cutz
summary: A hilarious cartoon simulation where you're absolutely terrible at cutting hair. Can you overcome your nerves and total pop culture ignorance to give your family a haircut that won't crush their dreams? Probably not, but you're gonna give it your best shot!

name: Quest for the Book of Truth
summary: A Zelda-inspired adventure for PICO-8!

name: Quadpop
summary: A puzzle game from Zero Logic Games.

name: Quizzical
summary: In Quizzical, you study randomly-generated nonsense text and are then quizzed on it.

name: Quiiiz
summary:
Quiiiz is a real time online trivia game platform that allows players to win cash prizes.
The game connects creators, community managers, and their fans in a thrilling festival of engagement and monetization.

name: Quarry Simulator 2020
summary: Quarry Simulator 2020 - inovation simulator and economical strategy about develop of the quarries. You beginner magnat, that need earn some money for his bussiness. INOVATION AND ORIGINAL IDEA.

name: Quarres
summary: Quarres ("squares" in Middle French) is a 2D puzzle in which your goal is to match the tiles in your board with the pattern on a sample board.

name: Quake: Func Jam 7
summary:
Func Jam 7's theme is "Back to Bases" - a community project at Func_Msgboard.

The pack follows a Base theme and features five small to medium-sized levels, some of which add unique twists to the gameplay. A skill selection/start hub map is included.

Note: These maps require Quoth and an engine port with increased limits.
This file has been repacked for Quaddicted.
An updated version of NewHouse's map is available here.

name: Quiz Nihon Mukashi Banashi: Athena no Hatena
summary: Quiz/Trivia game released in 1992 for the Game Boy.

name: Questor's Quest
summary: A game written by Mark Stahl for the 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Quiet Town
summary: Explore a wildness world full of strange creatures, relics and resources. Lumber, mine, build, fight, craft and farm to survival in this stranger land.

name: Queen's Tales: The Beast and the Nightingale
Quick Maths: addition and subtraction
summary:
Quick Maths is designed for high-speed counting.
Using our game, you can improve your speed and accuracy skills every day while practicing.

name: Queen's Garden 4: Sakura Season
summary:
It's Sakura Season in Japan and the Queen decided to celebrate!
Help Queen Ayame and the loyal minister Haruo decorate this exotic Japanese garden in this unique match-3 game! Play over 119 levels, collect coins and special jewels, purchase plants and decorations to design the most beautiful garden in Japan!

name: Quatrolon
summary: Quatrolon is a strategy, match game for PC.

name: Quantum Multiverse
summary: If you're looking for a immersive experience of Evading a predator hunting for you in a futuristic science facility, this is for you.

name: Quantum Legend - vr show
summary: A sneak action game,This software only provides visual and survival mode experience.

name: Quickdraw
summary: QUICKDRAW is a simple western-shootout-inspired fighting game that anyone can pick up and enjoy!

name: Queued
summary: Queued is an endless game with challenges, modes and nice music. You need to tap on the correct color button to match the first shape lined up in the queue. However, the time bar is running down, but the good news is tabbed correct will add back some points to it, and keep concentration while playing to avoid the wrong tabbed. How many shapes you can dequeue?

name: QuadSmash
summary: A frantic couch-multiplayer arcade game by Creative Patterns.

name: Queen At Arms: Deluxe Edition
summary: A Fantasy Wartime Adventure

name: Qu-tros
summary: Qu-tros is the ever-evolving puzzle.

name: Queen of Mountain
summary: Queen of Mountain is a bicycle team race game where you train or hire some good bike riders. Each rider has her own name, outlook, and skill ability. Team them up and win the game.

name: Quinidiom
summary: Endlessly bounce from tile to tile as you orbit around Quinidiom’s Core gathering letters to submit words. Rise to the challenge of the Core as accelerating gameplay tests your fortitude and offers maximum bonus potential.

name: Quartz's Quest
summary: An adventure for the Vectrex

name: Queens
summary: Queens is a very short but difficult platformer about a ruthless king who throws his many wives into a dangerous gauntlet whenever he tires of them. You lead each queen through the obstacles in the run and try to stay alive.

name: Quiz Sekai ha Show by Shoubai!!
summary: Released by Takara for the Game Boy (1992) and by Taito for the Arcade (1993). Based on the game show of the same title, broadcasted on Nippon Television.

name: Quattro Sports
summary: In Quattro Sports you get to try on four different sports; baseball, soccer, tennis and bmx.

name: Quadcopter Pilot Challenge
summary: Are you the top quadcopter pilot? Test yourself in over 200 challenges.

name: Quiz: Toukou Shashin
summary: Select a anime girl then answer questions to remove panels that cover girls' pictures.

name: Qubed
summary: This Ultimate Arcade bundle contains three award-winning audivisual masterpieces created by game guru Tetsuya Mizuguchi; Lumines LIVE, Every Extend Extra Extreme, and Rez HD. name: Quest for Glory II: Trial by Fire
summary:
Trial by Fire is the sequel to Hero's Quest: So You Want To Be A Hero. It takes place in the town Shapeir and the desert surrounding it, in a Middle East-like environment. It seems that the powerful elemental spirits have been troubling the Shapeir folk recently. Something, or someone, is behind those troubles. It is the hero's task to find out what is going on, get acquainted with the many inhabitants of Shapeir, and prove once more that he is worthy of his heroic title.

Like its predecessor, Trial by Fire is a hybrid game that incorporates elements from adventure and role-playing genres. It has a text-based interface, puzzles to solve, inventory items, characters to talk to, as well as pure RPG elements such as character growth system and battles. Player character can be either a fighter, a thief, or a wizard, and can also become a paladin during the course of the game if he follows a strict moral code.

Real-time combat is presented on separate screens and offers more options than the previous title. There are several types of high, mid-level, and low attacks, as well as parrying and dodging. The hero raises his combat proficiency and other skills by fighting enemies, training, and performing various actions that influence the corresponding parameters.

name: Quest for the Holy Joystick

It spoofs the contemporary software industry and the ZX Microfairs that took place in the UK in the 80's by sending the player on a magical mystery tour all over London

The player starts out at Downing Street number 5 and must take seemingly random journey on a red London bus to get to 'the umpteenth ZX Microfair at Alexandra Palace'. Along the way the player encounters numerous cultural figures as well as some of the gaming press. The game also makes excessive fun of the text adventure scene of the time.

The interface is text driven with few static graphics, as it is written using 'The Quill' the parser is limited to verb / noun input.

summary: Quatros Origins is a block puzzle game that tries to reconnect with the good old days where classic arcade games were easy to play, but hard to master!

name: Quake: Halloween Jam
summary: Halloween Jam was the first Halloween-themed community map pack held on QuakeAddicted in 2018, featuring six mostly Halloween/Horror-themed levels including haunted houses and graveyards. It also comes with a start map and lots of pumpkins and runs on a slightly stripped-down version of Arcane Dimensions that is included. The map sources are included as well.

name: Quiz Thiz Austria: Silver Edition
summary: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Quest for the Holy Grail
summary:
The Quest for the Holy Grail falls into the genre of a text adventure game but in addition to the text there are simple pictures which help add to the descriptions of the locations you are in and add to the atmosphere as you move around the game world.

You take on the role of the knight Sir Tappin, who is on a mission to track down the Holy Grail. You must navigate your way around the villages and countryside of medieval England to track down the clues that will help you on your quest. You will need to find objects to help you negotiate your way past the characters dotted along the way, such as the White Rabbit and the Knight Who Says Nic. The Quest for the Holy Grail is a trip through a possible version of history, with a liberal sprinkling of humour thrown in too.

name: Q.U.B.E. Ultimate Bundle
summary:
A bundle including the complete versions of Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary and Q.U.B.E. 2 (packaged as Q.U.B.E. 2 Deluxe Edition on the Epic Game Store and Q.U.B.E. 2 + Season Pass on Steam).

Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler. It features:

# Q.U.B.E. Original game (2012)
# Q.U.B.E. Director's Cut (2014)
# Over 100 puzzles to complete and 46 collectibles across 8 levels
# Sector 8, a new chapter featuring 4-6 hours of new gameplay
# Fresh visuals built from the ground up; full colour blind support
# Brand new commentary and assorted extras such as concept art and behind the scenes content.

Q.U.B.E. 2 Deluxe Edition gives players access to all released content including:

# The acclaimed Q.U.B.E. 2 Main Game
# Lost Orbit DLC with 10 new puzzle rooms, a final master puzzle and 32 collectibles to discover
# Aftermath DLC with 12 challenging new puzzle rooms, a master puzzle, brand new mechanics and 42 hidden collectibles across the map
# The iconic Glove Skin from the original Q.U.B.E.
# The incredible musical score of Q.U.B.E. 2 composed by David Housden.

name: Quantum Covenant
summary: Quantum Covenant is a multiplayer land-and-space dog-fighting game with full-featured gravity mechanics. Sling your ship around the arena's floating planet as you use your grappling hook to launch a bomb into the enemy’s goal - or use an array of weapons to destroy the enemy speeders first!

name: Quasar Kid
summary: Meet lots of new alien friends, invite them to your ship and explore the universe together

name: Quake 2 TC
summary:
“Quake 2 TC” Is a TC for Doom 2 that runs solely on GZDoom.

It uses all the original textures from Quake 2 on their original rendition as well as most of the ambient sounds of the game. The TC runs with the outstanding “Quake 2 Stuff” mod that brings all the weapons and enemies straight from the game into GZDoom with total accuracy.

The music comes from the Quake 2 port of Nintendo 64, composed by Aubrey Hodges.

My aim is to create a near perfect recreation of a ID Tech 2/Quake 2 level or expansion pack but with the Doom engine, enhanced and made possible only with GZDoom. Despite a few structural features and effects that are only possible on the Quake 2 engine, the results are near identical and that proves again how an ancient engine like Doom is capable to reach a similar level of technical capabilities with ease.

name: Quibbles
summary: A family friendly puzzle game.

name: Quake Upstart Mapping Project 2017
summary: QUMP is a project designed to get newcomers into mapping for Quake. Most of the mappers involved had never made a Quake map before, or had only made a few. Some of the maps are more seasoned mapper's first attempts from long ago. Ten small to large levels in varying themes/styles and a start hub map to access each of them.

name: Quiz Planet
summary: Quiz Planet is a fast-paced quiz game of intergalactic proportions where you can compete against your friends and other players.

name: Quattro Adventure
summary: Quattro Adventure features four action games on one cartridge.

name: Quantum Joe
summary: Quantum Joe is a precision pixel platformer with 100+ levels of fun, fast-paced retro-arcade style. Complete challenges and unlock stickers to decorate your play area, build custom levels with built-in level maker and share them through Steam Workshop. Includes single player and local co-op.

name: Quiz Gakumon no Susume
summary: Quiz Gakumon no Susume is an arcade quiz game developed and published by Konami released on 1993 exclusively in Japan.

name: Quiet Space
summary: Quiet Space is a short sci-fi game.

name: Quest to be King
summary: A mysterious and powerful army known as the Darkness has invaded the land of Thoria and threaten all the good races with extinction. To make matters worse a horde of Undead has also emerged and is spreading plague and death everywhere it goes. It’s up to you to unite the remaining races together and take the fight to your oppressors in this Match 3 RPG game.

name: Quadraticus HD
summary:
This game features a unique gameplay included 63 different levels. In the game you will collect the image using the shape (similar to that used in tetris), which are limited to moving only one axis. Playing in Quadraticus you will be a serious mental work and you spend a lot of time trying to collect a puzzle.
To pass each stage you need to reconstruct the given puzzle image using the provided pieces. You can always see the image using hint.
Each piece can only move vertically or horizontally, and this is shown in the upper left and right squares of the board while you are touching a piece.
The board can be rotated by using the buttons in the lower left and right or with the accelerometer.

name: Quality Television
summary: Those guards never knew what hit 'em.

name: Quantum Wizard
summary: A fantasy puzzle-platformer with true quantum physics set in the ancient Atlantis.

name: Quantum Gravity: Campaign
summary: Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell platformer. The game's main mechanic is inverting gravity to hover through space. Including long-range fights but also melees fighting. The Campaign mode features many unique and special levels to complete.

name: Quest of Graal
summary: Racing platformer with splitscreen multiplayer

name: Quick Fire
summary: The all new fast-paced minigame collection with over 50+ minigames. The more you play, the fast it gets.

name: Quickly, Quackley!
summary: A fast-paced 2D precision platformer with a ZX Spectrum aesthetic. And a duck!

name: Quiz F1 1,2 Finish
summary: A quiz game with an F1 racing theme.

name: Quiz Marugoto The World
summary: Quiz Marugoto The World is a Miscellaneous game, developed by AI and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 1991.

name: QuadraDigger
summary: QuadraDigger is a free browser-based rotating block puzzle game inspired by the original Game Boy handheld console.

name: Quest for 2Moo
summary: The newly-christened Vriskye arrives in a forest.

name: Quadrantica
summary: The pillars of light and color have sunk beneath the ocean, and an ashen gray has overcome the world - raise them back up by putting your logical thinking and deductive reasoning to the test.

name: Quantum Rush Champions: Jump Start Tournament
summary: This DLC contains the campaign "Jump Start Tournament" of the Early Access version. It is accessible to all 3 racer manufacturers and offers 5 tiers with many challenges, boss fights and unlocks, which are available only in this DLC!

name: QuadraPop
summary: A simple and straightforward puzzle java game developed for mobile devices with multiple sequels, one of them called QuadraPop Robotic.

name: Quidget the Wonderwiener
summary: Quidget the Wonderwiener is a spin-off of peninja

name: Quatro!: Eclipse DLC
summary: Space out with the Quatro! Eclipse DLC!

name: Quad Battle
summary: Quad Battle is a brand new monopoly game with auto battler, in the 4v4v4v4 party game, your actions need luck, your victories depend on teammates, and you just need to enjoy the game!

name: Quattro Super Hits
summary: Quattro Super Hits is a complication of four classic Codemaster games that was released for systems like the Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC, and ZX Spectrum.

name: Quest of Persia: Nader's Blade
summary: The third installment of Quest of Persia, following events of unexpected rise of Persia after post-Safavid era.

name: Quadrun
summary: Go around the edges of the screen to shoot up at the Captors, rescue Runts, and catch your bullets in this very difficult, and equally rare 2600 action/shooter.

name: Queen Frances and the Rat Rebellion
Quiet Manor
summary: Made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend jam.

name: Quadrablaze
summary: A bright, top-down space arena shooter with, boss fights, upgradable abilities and weapons. Choose from an assortment of abilities to power up your ship to your liking! Buy upgrades with skill points gained from leveling up.

name: Quatros Noir
summary: Quatros Noir is a fast-paced, fallen blocks, action puzzle game. Stack your blocks in more than one dimension and clear lines along the way. Master the campaign, +20 single modes, local multiplayer and co-op mode.

name: Quiver Dick's Epic Book of Fairy Fails
summary: Embark on a hilarious quest as Richard Longshlong, (Young Quiverdick), and his derpditty-derp-pants partner, Deputy Stoney, as they take down fairy-fail creatures that you most certainly do not recognize from your childhood due to copyright reasons!

name: Quake: A Verdant Dawn
summary: Verdant Dawn is a large murky medieval fortress for Quake inspired by Foggy Bogbottom and The Forgotten Sepulcher from Arcane Dimensions. Comes with a custom skybox and a music track. The map source is included. This expert map should last experience players twenty to half an hour.

name: Quake: Unforgiven
summary:
Epic fantasy episode with three huge levels, hardcore horde battles with many new monsters and bosses, several new and modified weapons and items from the Drake mod (latest version is included). It also comes with a start map, custom skyboxes and background music.

Note: This episode requires an engine port with increased limits. The max_edicts value has to be raised to 2048 if supported.

name: Quake: Func Xmas Jam 2017
summary:
Func Xmas Jam 2017 - a community Xmas Jam this time held at Func_Msgboard. This pack features 11 small "Arcane Dimensions" maps in varied styles where all gameplay takes place within a 1024x1024x1024 space. It comes with a few custom skyboxes, sounds, and a music track. The map sources are included.

Note: These maps require Arcane Dimensions 1.60 or later and a source port with increased limits.

name: Quake: Realms of Tiddles
summary:
Seven classic maps made in 1998-2001 by Peter Bisseker, also known as Tiddles. A variety of themes (base, rogue brick, wizmet) in an early yet distinct style.

All levels were released separately, but were intended to lead into each other. This release is a modern repackaging by historical map appreciator Greenwood, curating all of Tiddles' single player maps together into a convenient episode.

name: Queen of Thieves
summary: Play as Joanne, Kira and Thalia in this dating sim/RPG. Explore the catacombs and do robberies across the town of Ahkra. Meet 6 characters for a total of 12 possible different romances!

name: Quiet Maple
summary: Make maple syrup in an atmospheric experience in Quebec's cold.

name: Quack Attack 1985: Turbo DX Edition
summary: Duckster doesn't give a crap about any one or any thing. Collect eggs in a variety of extreme and overwhelming game modes, cool?

name: Quarth
summary: Unlicensed Master System port of the MSX version of Quarth (Block Hole).

name: Quiet Sleep
summary: This is a fun network shooter. Complete missions alone or with friends. In Quiet Sleep you perform the role of a military man who arrived at point "M" to guard the medical center.

name: Quack Island
summary: You wake up on a sandy beach; no memory, no supplies and no way home. But you’re not the only one. Somehow, a crew of sentient ducks have found themselves stranded here. And you’re going to have to work together with your new feathered friends, if you ever hope to escape - Quack Island!

name: Quest Eternal
summary: Speed you way through different levels and environments in this old-school platformer. Unlock new abilities and try to complete the levels as fast as possible. Go back to previous levels and try to beat your old score using your newfound power. Fight and defeat evil on your eternal quest.

name: Quiet us
summary: A short horror game about companionship

name: Qubd
summary:
Test your math, addition, subtraction, multiplication and observational skills in this fun and simple game of guessing how many Cubes are missing from the 5x5x5 Cube volume.
Sharpen your mind and give your brain a workout while completing ever challenging levels.

name: Quoala
summary: Minimalist narrative game with a GPS device.

name: Quiz Magic Academy 2
summary: Second game in Konami's Arcade Quiz Game series.

name: QuizPoker: Mix of Quiz and Poker
summary:
Put your knowledge of various topics to the test or bluff your way to victory!

QuizPoker combines poker and quiz elements. Unlike poker, however, QuizPoker does not deal cards, but asks guessing questions to which each player gives an answer.

name: Quaternion
summary: Quaternion is a total-conversion modification of the game Marble Blast Gold, which is a ball-rolling platform game released in 2003. Quaternion puts a new spin on the game, adding a central hub level and more puzzle-oriented gameplay, as well as modernized graphics and physics.

name: Quests Unlimited
summary: Quests Unlimited is inspired by a love for classic idle games like Progress Quest. Quests Unlimited is a classical interpretation of the idle rpg genre with a more traditional rpg style of gameplay being emulated. Accept and complete quests, sell your drops in town, equip new gear and spend your hard earned currency upgrading it and becoming more formidable.

name: Quadradius
summary: Quadradius is an intricate and competitive game of skill, chance, bluffing, and devastation. It is a turn-based board game played by 1 to 6 people on a three dimensional grid. Each piece can collect Power Orbs scattered throughout the arena, these orbs contain one of over 30 versatile powers that can be unleashed to attack, defend, foil your opponent's plans, or be combined together for even greater devastating effects.

name: Quake: The Final Descent
summary:
The Final Descent is an ambitious early 2000 Episode for Quake by Hellscrag.
The Final Descent is an Episode with nine medium to large maps (including a secret map) in varying styles - Base/Wizard/Metal - with many caverns and fortresses, and a few new monsters and new weapons. This map should last an experienced player 2 hours of playtime.

name: Quebec Mortis
summary: Quebec Mortis is a retro-styled survival horror game. It has elements from the modern survival horror games but in a NES-era fashion. It is packed with puzzles, action and a creepy atmosphere. Complete it in one evening!

name: Quest for Glory I: So You Want to Be a Hero
summary: A VGA remake of the original Quest for Glory, made using Sierra's SCI1.1 interpreter. Unlike the original game, the remake uses a point and click interface instead of a text-parser.

name: Queen's Crown 2
summary: In Queen's Crown 2 you will join Ann on her adventure to save Avalon and the rest of the world! Spectacular battles await you along with new costumes, weapons, skills, gems and magic!

name: Quadoban
summary:
Moving blocks is simple, but what if they were quantum-locked, and all moved at the same time!?
You'll have to think ahead to shift all the boxes into place, in this curiously new Sokoban style puzzle game, featuring 1000 levels!
How many can you beat!?

name: Quiz Movie!
summary:
Do you love movies? If so, you’ve found the right game for you! Think
you're a true movie expert and can guess any popular movie without
effort?

name: Quake: Raven Keep
summary: Raven Keep is a mod for Quake where players will explore a dark gothic environment in order to unravel the secret of the lost chalices. Encounter fantastic new foes and find deadly new weaponry on your quest. Raven Keep is designed to be played with the Quakespasm 0.93.2 source port.

name: Quake: Backsteingotik
summary:
A very large brick-style dungeon with wind tunnels from Arcane Dimension's "sock". It has a built-in skill selection area and comes with custom medieval items. The source is included in the PAK.

Note: Maps requires an engine port with increased limits.

name: Quake 1.5
summary:
Quake 1.5 is a darkplaces addon mod for the original Quake. Utilizing Seven's SMC 5.30 as a base, it has been expanded to include new features such as weapons, gore, and plenty of level additions.

Quake 1.5 is firstly a weapons overhaul, the original weapon pack's goal was to redo the quake 1 weapons to give them more feedback. Changes in the mod version include things like shell ejection, seeing rockets slide into the tube, additional frames for nailguns and a spin up/down on the SNG like Q2's chaingun.

name: Quake: Retro Jam Koohoo
summary:
A pack of 10 Koohoo themed Mesoamerican temple maps made in two weeks, for vanilla Quake. A custom start map is included, and a map source is included.
This map pack should last an experienced player two to three hours.

name: Quake: Retro Jam Windtunnel
summary: Fifth "retro" map jam held at Func_Msgboard, following an E3M5/The Wind Tunnels theme, resulting in seven small to medium-sized levels. Retro Jams are made to be played with a vanilla engine and require no modification.

name: Queen of Treasure Isle
summary:
Queen of treasure isle is a simple, small-scale metroidvania that mainly consists of bomb throwing and jumping.

You can retrieve the treasure hidden in various places and return home in a balloon when you are done.

name: Quick Majik Adventure
summary: Ostensibly the shareware version of a more robust, non-quick Majik Adventure, as with their later Dragon Hunt this is a bit of a graphical roguelike, placing a fantasy adventurer smack in the middle of level 75 of a series of random and devious dungeons, filled to the gills with treasures and hostile creatures. As an earlier effort Neurosport hadn't yet extruded the perspective into three bewildering dimensions here, and so we still retain the traditional top-down view, prettied up (and range-of-view constrained) with a graphical tile set.

name: Quaterneon
summary: A simple running game. Dodge rotating objects, while trying to capture orange cubes for a score.

name: Quotes Quest - Match 3
summary: Unlock 525 inspirational quotes, play 700 unique levels altogether. Choose from more than 160-thousand animated color themes anytime - more than 112-million theme/level combinations! Watch relaxing fish swim about, listen to selection of music tracks. Weeks or months of fun!

name: Quake: Func Jam 9
summary: Func Map Jam #9 - a community project at Func_Msgboard. This pack features 15 Contract Revoked / Knave-themed levels of varying sizes. It comes with a start map and many custom models, sounds, and skyboxes. The map sources are included.

name: Quietcar
summary: Quietcar is a horror game taking place on a train.

name: Quake: Q25 Limits Jam
summary: Q25 Limits Jam is a vanilla Quake collaborative jam made for Quake's 25th anniversary which reads; a great collection of maps made in the spirit of "Maximum DOS Performance". 16 small to large Old-School levels in varying classic themes, and a start hub map, all keeping within the original game's technical and stylistic restraints.

name: Quake: Func Jam 3
summary: A community project at Func_Msgboard. The pack features 6 small to large Zerstörer-themed maps. The complete Zer mod is included in this release, and so are the map sources. This map pack was very early in Quake single-player modding and included impressive map designs.

name: Quake: Realms of the Lost
summary: Realms of the Lost is a Finnish mappers episode jam for Quake based on the Copper mod (included) with nine medium to large maps in varying themes, including a start hub and a secret level. It also features a few new sounds and music tracks by Immorpher.

name: Quake: SMEJ Jam
summary: Community map pack inspired by SMEJ and SMEJ2: nine small to large levels plus a start/hub map in varying themes, mostly set in snowy Finnish landscapes. It is based on the SMEJ2 mod (included) and features new enemies, models, custom textures, skyboxes, and music tracks. The map sources are included. SMEJ made were originally a map pack of Finnish mappers - Curiously, none of the maps are made by the Finnish SMEJ team.

name: Quake
summary: A cancelled Game Boy Advance port of Quake.

name: QuizPig
summary:
QuizPig is a 100% free (no ads, no in-app purchases) general knowledge quiz game covering 5 main categories: General Knowledge, Geography & Cultures, Entertainment & Sport, History & Politics and Science & Nature.
Get questions right to earn stars and unlock more quizzes.
Be prepared for a challenge though, as some of these questions are seriously tricky!
At launch we have over 300 questions, and more are on the way in an update very soon.

name: QuickPick Farmer
summary: In QuickPick Farmer you get 30 crazy levels, a non-stop mode, striped sheep, spotted sheep, not to mention a goofy wolf... Test your powers of observation, your reflexes and your tactics in the whacky game!

name: Quetzalcoatl
summary: Quetzalcoatl is your new challenge! Be prepared to push the limits of your brain with its 180 carefully designed snaky puzzles! Dozens of hours of gameplay are awaiting you!

name: Quescaper
summary: You were thrown into a dungeon with the undead and only a sword was left for defense. Can you get through this underground maze and survive?

name: Quiplash: Quip Pack 1
summary: Refresh your Quiplash game with 125 brand-new, laugh-inducing prompts! Contains a bakers’ dozen of user-submitted prompts from our Kickstarter contributors! Don’t own just SOME of the available Quiplash content… own it all!

name: Quaterneo
summary: Atmospheric action puzzle game.

name: Quake: Rapture
summary: A nine-map single-player episode with Daikatana E3 and Hexen II textures, and monsters from Nehahra, Scourge of Armagon, and Coven of Ebony. While this map taken from other, bigger mods ("Tronyn's" own Coven of Ebony for example), was one of the few intricate map packs of 2001 and stood the test of time many years later.

name: Quadratic Puzzle 4
summary: "Quadratic puzzle 4" is a beautiful girl puzzle game made by "Rabbit studio", with multiple puzzle modes, challenge your fastest record!

name: QuizDuel!
summary:
Join millions of players and climb the daily toplists – Who is the besserquizzer!?
QuizDuel is an intelligent, colorful and fun social quiz game where you can challenge your friends and other random quizzers to exciting games of trivia – and learn amazing new facts.

name: Quake: The Punishment Due
summary: Episode with five medium to large maps in varying themes plus a start map. It is based on the Copper mod (included) and comes with two custom skyboxes, a few sounds and music tracks. The map sources are included.

name: Quake: Dwell
summary: Quake Dwell is a modification for Quake that features Four Episodes of varied and unique themes. and Four Custom Bosses, one for each Episode. Brand new monsters, including many returning from other Quake worlds. New weapons to hunt down and utilize. A Complete Soundtrack by Alekswithak. Support for up to 4 player co-op.

name: Questlike
summary: Questlike is a Lo-fi take on the classic dungeon rpg formula. Band your Party together and test your mettle against Endless Challenges.

name: Quento
summary: Quento is a little math puzzler without ads aimed for kids and adults. Quento gives you the solution to a sum and you'll have to do the math.
