To play, just swipe from a number to a + or - and to another number again. Stars are earned when the sum adds up to the challenge above and before you know it you've progressed a round!

name: Quest of Peril
summary: Dive into the dark world of a Dying Earth, in this Idle exploration rougelike with turn based combat

name: Quick Draw
summary: This is a multiplayer game where each player has a cowboy with a gun. You must shoot your partner before he shoots you. The first to reach five wins. Use the Cacti and passing wagon for cover. Each player’s score is displayed at the top of the screen.

name: Quantum of Soul
summary: Quantum of Soul is a tab-targeting online RPG enriched with tactical card game combat. Travel the universe, complete missions, and fight in the arena while gathering cards. Expand your card collection, build your deck, and adapt it to the challenges.

name: Quixzel Rush: Tooth Protector
summary: Quixzel Rush Tooth Protector brings fun and excitement to casual arcade gamers. Crash through enemies, collect heals, and maximize the time you can survive in this high score arcade game.

name: Quest of Lost Memories
summary: You wake up inside the latest virtual reality MMORPG but have no memory of starting the game. In fact, you can't recall your past at all. Upon discovering your class as a healer and noticing a one-of-a-kind weapon in your inventory, you're quickly recruited by a dashing mage to join his guild. Things take a dark turn, however, when a virus breaks out and begins infecting and killing players in real life when they log off. In a race against the clock, you and your guildmates embark on a quest to discover and destroy the source...

name: Quick Words
summary: Quick Words is the bigger, better, 5 letter word guessing game that lets you play 5 words in the same game. Play it fast, play it slow, play it windowed, leave it in the background. Do as you please.

name: QUByte Classics: Radical Rex
summary:
Radical Rex is a classic adventure platformer game that brings a fire-breathing Tyrannosaurus on a skateboard that has to save his race from the spell of an evil creature.

Rex can ride his skateboard, breath fire and kick the enemies to defeat them, jump, swing on vines and roar to shake everything! He will slam through ten wild levels, like jungles, freaked-out forests, haunted dino-graveyards, piranha-infested underwater caves and even inside a giant dinosaur!

No sweet for Rex - because he's too Radical to be extinct!

name: Queen Pirate: Love Adrift
summary: For anyone else, setting sail for a betrothal would be a dangerous proposition—but the Crystal Eye in your possession, your bejeweled birthright, makes you unsinkable. But on the eve of your betrothal, a treacherous plot unfolds. Suddenly you're surrounded by three debonair pirates eager to steal your booty.

name: Quinn & Flynn
summary: A mature queer visual novel, telling the heated and convoluted story of the love triangle between Quinn, an obsessive police detective, Elias, Quinn's direct superior, and Flynn, a poet with a very talented tongue, caught in a criminal case that spirals rapidly out of hand.

name: Quoridor
summary: The abstract strategy game Quoridor is surprisingly deep for its simple rules. The object of the game is to advance your pawn to the opposite edge of the board. On your turn you may either move your pawn or place a wall. You may hinder your opponent with wall placement, but not completely block them off. Meanwhile, they are trying to do the same to you. The first pawn to reach the opposite side wins.

name: Quest Master's Realm
summary: Realtime Action Combat MMORPG. Battle Foes and Complete Quests to Level up your Skills and Equipment, ready to face the most Mythic of Enemies. Swap between different Skill Sets whilst playing as the Same Character. Craft and Discover New Items of increasing Rarity.

name: Quake: Halloween Jam 2
summary: Second Halloween Jam community project featuring 14 levels of varying styles, and a start map. The levels run on the Arcane Dimensions mod (included). The map sources are included.

name: Quake: Sewer Jam
summary: Sizeable community mapping pack with 11 sewer-themed levels and a start map based on the Extras mod with a few additions, among which are two new sewer-themed enemies. It also features custom skyboxes and a few music tracks

name: Qual a Capa?
summary:
Qual a Capa? is an interactive game for streamers that can be played with the audience through Twitch chat.
Players need to guess the blurred book cover displayed on the screen before the time ends up.

name: Quanect
summary: The game has two realities, and in order to pass the level, you must move between them. Reality is not identical, objects and their position in different variations of the same room is different. You have to find a way out using these differences.

name: Queen: The Eye
summary: Queen: The Eye is an action-adventure game featuring music by Queen. The game is set in the future where "the eYe", and all-seeing machine that has destroyed creative expression in people, is ruling the world.

name: Quizzitive
summary:
Quizzitive is an entertaining quiz, an addictive game, and a new way to test and improve your vocabulary! The goal is to master "1000 Words Worth Knowing" - words selected by Merriam-Webster editors to challenge, intrigue, and contribute to a powerful vocabulary.
Quizzitive offers 10 difficulty levels, with quiz types from "Speed Drill" to "Name That Thing." Master the words, beat your personal best, and see how your scores compare to the crowd.

name: Quadtris: Draw Puzzle
summary: A puzzle game from UnderAIR.

name: Quest for the Crystal Skulls
summary:
Quest for the Crystal Skulls is a new action-packed episode for Heretic.
Corvus is confronted by a Heresiarch, a powerful minion of the Serpent Riders. This dark wizard has stolen three crystal skulls, using their power to open a portal to the underworld in the hopes of bringing about his master's return.
Corvus must collect the remaining six crystal skulls in order to unlock the celestial path and confront the Heresiarch before it's too late.

name: Quit the Game to Win
summary: It's not as simple as it sounds.

name: Quake VR
summary: Quake VR is a VR modification for Quake, allowing motion controls with the use of a virtual reality headset.

name: Quick Cast Chaos
summary: An unlikely hero ventures across a magical kingdom to defeat the monstrous Moon Menace and rescue the Star Sovereign.

name: Quizl
summary: Quizl is a daily trivia game where each day there will be a new set of questions to answer. The questions are individually picked and test all areas of knowledge. Your scores are then marked out of five and added to your stats page. There are also additional game modes and features.

name: Quest & Quest 3D: Short Short - Female Adventurer Sina
summary: A role-playing game from Ashita ha docchida!?.

name: Quarto
summary:
Quarto is a subtle strategy game with the simplest rules. With more than one million units sold, this abstract game is a masterpiece with worldwide fame.
Each piece has 4 different characteristics that make them unique (color, shape, size, hollow or solid). In every turn, the player selects an available piece for their opponent, who then has to play it by placing it on any empty square on the board… so players don't get choose the pieces they play themselves!
The winner is the first to create a line of 4 pieces with a common characteristic. One of the players will inevitably hand their opponent victory on a plate.

name: Quick Thief
summary: Quick Thief is the simplest 2D game in which you have to steal things and sell them and try not to get in the eyes of the guards.

name: QuestLord 2
summary:
The Astral Sorceress, Thelia, has returned to find another QuestLord to solve the challenges that face the Realms of the Second Age! 
 
Set in the fantasy world of the Realms of the Second Age, the player must manage a balance of skill and crafting from 5 types of Lore (Battle, Beast, Scout, Science and Magic). Meeting a variety of characters, traveling the vast lands, defeating enemies and solving Quests, the QuestLord will help Thelia solve what has plagued the realms for so long.

name: Quads Puzzle
summary: Quads Puzzle is a simple game where the user needs to form lines to gain points. Simple, fun and relaxing.

name: Questions Pour un Champion: Edition Spéciale 20 Ans
summary:
A quizz game adapted from a French TV show.
You can test your general knowledge by playing one the three game modes.
The Super Champion mode recreates the TV show specials where you need to reach 5 victories in a row.
The Partie Classique mode allow you to play on game.
The Entrainement mode allows you to train yourself.

name: Quarter Horse Racing
summary: Spend a day at the races - Quarter Horse races.

name: Quintaesencia
summary: Quintaesencia: An open world of fantasy and magic

name: Quantum Derail
summary: A point&click adventure game set in the near future in which you are a policeman solving a physics related mystery.

name: Quiz Thiz Croatia: Bronze Edition
summary: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Quake: Cassandra Calamity
summary:
Cassandra Calamity (also known as Mexx10) is the last map pack of Marcus Dromowicz (mexx), of early Quake fame. It is the second-largest mexx map, with two large, detailed base levels with a story, some new textures, skins and sounds, and custom cyborg enforcers, along with a few other additions. The author encouraged co-op play.

The map was one-of-a-kind for its custom enemies and the presence of a story, as well as being a comparatively large map pack at its time (3420kb).

name: Quarantine
summary: Medium sized base map.

name: Quake: Alkaline Jam
summary: Nine large, open industrial/base levels and a starting hub map. The underlying mod features a large number new and modified enemies, weapons and additional content like models, sounds, skyboxes and music tracks for each map. It is also meant to serve as a general toolbox for base-themed levels.

name: Quasimorphosis: Exordium
summary: Sci-fi roguelike with tactical missions and survival horror elements. Take the role of a PMC fighter and find out the situation on the Frantsev-7 space station in the orbit of Saturn.

name: Qué pasa Neng: El videojuego
summary: Que Pasa Neng is a game based off a character created by Spanish comedian Edu Soto, Neng de Castefa, in which he parodies the urban tribe of Bakalas and Canis. The gameplay consists of 5 mini-games in which you must pass the same test 3 times before advancing to the next mini-game.

name: QuestEvent
summary: QuestEvent is an adventure RPG. You will have a world to explore, practice different Skills and doing Quests.

name: Quest for Sleeping Beauty
summary:
Quest for Sleeping Beauty is a 3D Pac-Man variant played from a bird's-eye perspective. It is based on the fairytale Sleeping Beauty. Bored of her royal tasks Sleeping Beauty decides to enter a dangerous forest alone. Eventually she gts lost after wandering deep into the forest and takes shelter in an abandoned castle. She is now waiting for a prince to rescue her.

The player takes control of a young boy or girl and has to collect all the pellets on a map to advance. Spiders and other enemies are harassing the player and when caught by a spider, a live is lost. Across the map potions can be found to fend off the enemies. These come in several colors: Red ones will scare the enemies away, blue ones will freeze the enemies (run over it to kill it) and green ones will make you invisible.

name: Queer Man Peering Into A Rock Pool.jpg
summary: A joyful, strange experience in which a middle-aged queer man toddles around an island attempting to re-furnish his empty house.

name: Quantum Conquest
summary: Conquer the battlefield in Quantum Conquest! Outwit opponents by strategically placing Tokens, engaging in intense combat, and fortifying your position with unique Forts. Explore diverse gameplay options that challenge your tactical skills. Are you prepared for the ultimate turn-based showdown?

name: Quake: Func Jam 6
summary:
Func Map Jam 6 - Fire and Brimstone - a community project at Func_Msgboard. The pack features 13 Fire and Brimstone-themed levels of varying sizes as well as a start map. It comes with a couple of skyboxes, and the map sources are included.

Note: Some of the maps require an engine port with increased limits; ericw/Tronyn's map requires 2PSB support. Additionally, support for fog and colored lighting is recommended. You will need to increase the default heap size for some maps, see the comments for more information.

name: Quarter Past Curse
summary: Quarter Past Curse is first person shooter game.

name: Quiet City
summary: A game by Stephen Lavelle (increpare). The player begins the game by populating an urban area with the noise and activity of people.

name: Quest of Souls
summary: Quest of Souls is a twin-stick fantasy shoot 'em up RPG inspired by the 90's era of SNES games, about a corgi dragonslayer, a goodly lich, a lizardman samurai, and their quest to track down a powerful magical artifact that was stolen by a mysterious dark sorcerer.

name: Quin
summary: A simple and fun card game to play with friends! Discard suit, or the same number, and be the first to run out of cards.

name: Quanero
summary: Quanero is an experimental VR experience for the HTC Vive and the Oculus Rift. Your goal is to figure out what caused a violent incident in a futuristic bar by manipulating the time. You can slow down time, reverse it or bring it to a halt. Explore the scene, unlock the story's branch points and unravel the mystery.

name: Quedex
summary:
You play a rolling eyeball in an attempt to find your way through numerous mazes. Each maze features different puzzles to solve and objects such as keys to collect in order to find the destination. There is a limited amount of time to solve each maze. 
 
This game was known as Mind-Roll in the US. Quedex is the PAL name.

name: Quester
summary: Quester is an action roguelike inspired by classic arcade games of yore. Assume control of a courageous adventurer and blaze through monster infested mazes, all while keeping your stamina-- AKA "POWER" bar charged.

name: Quest Industries
summary: An incremental factory builder where you build a factory that produces fantasy RPG gear for adventurers. Gather resources and craft items to sell. Invest your earnings to discover exotic resources and legendary items blueprints that will make you a fortune.

name: Quick Golf
summary: Swing into Adventure: Golf Like a Pro!

name: Quixzel Rush: Pumpkin Bash
summary: Quixzel Rush Pumpkin Bash brings fun and excitement to casual arcade gamers. Crash through enemies, collect heals, and maximize the time you can survive in this high score arcade game.

name: Queen of Seas
summary:
Queen of Seas is a casual platformer game. The game theme is about Yemanjá, the Queen os Seas in afro-brazilian religion.
You play as a fisherman's son, that need to dive deep and deliver offerings to the Queen os Seas as a poof of his family's faith.

name: Queen's Garden: Christmas
summary: It's Christmas time in the Queen's land and she decided to celebrate! Help Jack, her loyal advisor to decorate the garden for a magical Christmas season in this merry match-3 game!

name: Quadrobat
summary: Quadrobat is a precision platformer with unique movement. Using a grapple you can swing through the world with speed and momentum.

name: Quantum Apex
summary: Sci Fi Stunt/Street Racer With Nitrous. Strong emphasis on FUN! Handling Is a well balanced fusion of Arcade and simulation. There is no traction control There is simply the car, the player and the physics. Race Tracks are designed to test every Cm of your driving capabilities.

name: Q.u.q.
summary: Q.u.q. is a surreal visual novel about a somewhat crude girl that wanders a desert.

name: QuadraPop Robotic
summary: A futuristic looking version of the classic java game QuadraPop

name: Queen of Zarkov
summary: 'Queen of Zarkov' is an 'indie-3rd-person-shooter' that combines elements of 'Escape from Tarkov' with zombies. Embark on missions and loot everything you can, while surviving against different types of zombies and other deadly threats. All your Equipment will be lost if you die, so try to survive!

name: Quiz 4 All
summary: Do you like Quiz games? Use your knowledge and challenge your friends to play this fun quiz game. Quiz 4 All is perfect for group fun!

name: Quiller's Code
summary: Solve ciphers to uncover the identity of the Quiller.

name: QuadcopterFx Simulator
summary: This is a Quadcopter / Multirotor RC Drone simulator with first person view, HUD, Return Home, Course Lock, Home Lock, Camera Gimbal, Acro mode, Acro 3D mode and more.

name: Quest for Saddam
summary: In Quest for Saddam, your mission is to find and capture Saddam Hussein. As a highly trained, special forces soldier, you're armed with an arsenal of weapons and a coalition of comical characters. Battles take you across Iraq, fighting hordes of Iraqi soldiers in your ultimate quest, Saddam Hussein.

name: Quest Together
summary: Take up your sword and shield and go on a quest with your friends!

name: Quynh
summary: Stories revolving around the guests of a mysterious tea shop and its owner.

name: Q.U.B.E.
summary:
Q.U.B.E. is a first person puzzle solving game set in a structure made from white cubes. Coloured cubes in the environment can be manipulated by the player using a pair of technologically enhanced gloves. Using these coloured cubes as tools, the player must complete a series of challenging puzzles.

Created by Toxic Games, Q.U.B.E cleverly integrates a unique visual world and a player’s intuitive physics and visual understanding to create engrossing puzzles.

name: Questizin
summary: A short action RPG. You are a brave hero trying to open up the path to the east through a misterious cave. The game features 5 sets of equipment, 4 enemies with particular attacks, 4 very nice npcs and a main quest to be solved with a final puzzle.

name: Quake: Contract Revoked
summary: Contract Revoked was a 2002 episode consisting of 4 levels and a start map, with knave textures, some modified models, and sounds. It was later made into an official free DLC for the 2021 remaster of Quake.

name: Quiz Meitantei Neo & Geo: Quiz Daisousasen Part 2
summary:
Quiz Meitantei Neo & Geo: Quiz Daisousasen Part 2 is a quiz adventure game released for the Neo Geo in Japan only. It is a direct sequel to Quiz Daisousa Sen: The Last Count Down released the year prior.

Players once again take control over the detectives Neo McDonald or Geo Kentucky, who must explore the city and interrogate people.

name: Quilly
summary: This is a short adventure of Joe, who helps Climmy. Joe meets several people during his trip. So enjoy this little peace of adventure. Players will uncover the mystery of Quilly. You are in a 2d adventure and have to solve several tasks to find the laptop of Climmmi.

name: Quint's Revenge
summary:
Quint's Revenge stars the titular Mega Man from the far future. The twist here, Dr. Light knew of Dr. Wily's trip through time to reprogram Mega Man. Now free from Wily's control, Mega Man, i.e Quint, sets out for revenge.

The game adheres closely to Mega Man 2 and 3 but moves at a much quicker pace. The whole game is built around Quint's seldom seen abilities, like Sonic Dash, ducking, and ledge grabbing. It's an interest twist of the tried-and-true NES formula. Though still in beta, the game spans fifteen stages (8 Robot Masters, an intro stage, 6 fortress stages).

name: Queen's Conquest
summary: Experience the fast-paced deep battle system and a high degree of freedom in a fantasy world where Holy Knights and Wizards fight with the power of Mana!

name: Queen of Succubus
summary: A role-playing game from Shrine's Gate.

name: Quarantine Town
summary: Survive against relentless zombie hordes in an immersive post-apocalyptic world. Battle through waves, explore treacherous environments, and make split-second decisions to stay alive. Can you endure the nightmare and outlast the undead? It's a test of strategy, skill, and nerves.

name: Quacky Oliver
summary: A horror survival adventure game where you try to survive the night from a monstrous rubber duck. Use a water physics system, a hose & a flashlight to explore a suspicious daycare & fight Quacky Oliver.

name: Quick Revolver
summary: Use rhythm and strategy to beat enemies in this western epic revolver battle

name: Quest: Escape Dungeon
summary: Join the group of adventurers in the quest for treasures! Solve puzzles and fight the dungeon guards to find the cave full of gold and get back home safely.

name: Qubic
summary: Qubic is a retro-like turn-based puzzle game in which your task is to solve the labyrinth, collect the stars to unlock next level, avoid enemies/traps and... save your qubic green ass!

name: Quest of D
summary: Quest of D is a Japanese card/arcade hack n' slash published by Sega. Players battle through a dungeon using a joystick and collectible cards to use special abilities.

name: Queen of Seas 2
summary: Queen of Seas 2 is a platform game based on elements of afro-brazilian culture. Player needs to bring hope back to the village, rescuing the villager's lost memories in the ocean floor to make faith in Yemanjá return to the hearts of the residents.

name: Quantum Conundrum: The Desmond Debacle
summary: Power up your Inter-Dimensional Shift Device and get ready for a brand new adventure in an unexplored wing of Quadwrangle Manor. Experience Desmond, the drinking bird, as you've never seen him before in even more brain twisting and complex puzzles! The Desmond Debacle provides hours of inter-dimensional puzzle solving.

name: Quasar Commander
summary: Quasar Commander is an exciting game of skill to play on your TRS-80 color computer. You are at the helm of a Starship. Imagine that your video screen is a window looking into outerspace. Your laser sights are in the center of this "viewscreen". Try to destroy as many enemy ships as possible before colliding with them. This game contains variations for countless hours of fun.

name: QUByte Classics: The Tale of Clouds and Wind
summary: The Tale of Cloud and Wind (QUByte Classics) is a beat’em up game with lots of action and hours of gameplay. Choose between 3 outlaw heroes and help them battle through oppressing armies of evil men.

name: Quietus Allurment
summary: Quietus Allurement follows a captured man trapped in a facility that is doing illegal tests on him. Things go awry when the head of the facility began creating creatures and releasing them on the scientists and test subjects. The attacks grew in number until the facility was overrun. Now the captured man must fight his way out to gain his freedom before the creatures kill him as well.

name: Quarterback
summary:
The Leland Corporation presents QUARTERBACK, the most exciting football game ever. This is football the way it was meant to be, with all the action and all the strategy.

Players call their owna plays and the spring-loaded joystick gives them complete control of the passing and the kicking game. The exclusive individual stat storage feature keeps players coming back for new and even more challenging games. This is real football with game play that could only come from the people at the Leland Corporation.

name: Quacktown Smackdown
summary: Play as a Rubber Ducky in this 3rd Person Arena Shooter! Utilize squirt guns and water abilities and sink your opponents to become top duck of the tub! Battle it out in the Bubble Bath Battlefield or the Stormy Sandbox. Customize your ducky to make sure the lobby knows who's the Smack Down King!

name: Quiet Christmas
summary: NoStatic's Christmas-themed follow-up to Quiet, Please!

name: Quake: Torrent of Impurities
summary: Finnish mappers of the first acclaimed "SMEJ" came back for an episode jam 2, the sequel to Realm of the Lost: seven large maps in varying themes, based on the Copper mod (included). It also features four new monsters, a new boss, a few new sounds, and music tracks. The map pack then inspired the community to create a "SMEJ Map Jam", with no intervention from the original SMEJ team.

name: Quantum Bummer Blues
summary: Escape from space prison, smash atoms, chase high scores, and paint pretty pictures with the river of your blood.

name: Quietus
summary: As he’s taking a man’s life, Death decides to have a little fun. He tells the man that he will give him his life back along with everything he ever wanted—if the man can survive the Gauntlet of Hell.

name: Quadrilactic
summary: Quadrilactic is a simple browser based game about a quadrilateral that has gone intergalactic.

name: Quest For Corgi Butts
summary: A kaizo light hack dedicated to our favorite pig in space after Twitch took away his emote. RIP spacep10GG 2019-2020

name: Quarantennis
summary: Play tennis with your neighbor across the street in this GBC inspired arcade game

name: Quo
summary: A first-person dystopian-horror sci fi-liminal adventure inspired by Backrooms. In this mission you are Quo, an autonomous robot explorer. Trace, probe and delve into an unexplored reality full of enigmas and dangers. Now it's your turn.

name: Quarx
summary: Quarx is an XNA community game

name: Quench
summary: Quench is a story-driven puzzle game set in a colourful, lo-fi world. Become shepherd, an avatar of nature, and guide herds of animals on their difficult journey. Help Shaman, the young Elephant leader, convince the other animal tribes to join her. Protect the herds as they are beset by flood, fire, drought, and the dark smokebeasts that have spread across the land.

name: Quest for Camelot
summary: The unreleased home console version of Quest For Camelot’s video game adaption, which got scrapped due to the film’s poor box office performance.

name: Quiz Thiz Germany: Silver Edition
summary: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: QUByte Classics: The Samurai Collection
summary: Experience the ultimate in martial arts mayhem in The Samurai Collection!

name: Quadrax
summary: Quadrax is a puzzle game where two characters have to be moved to a predefined place in logical levels. As the entire screen is filled with obstacles, the characters need to help each other get around by flipping switches, moving stone blocks, opening doors, and using lifts. It was originally released for the ZX Spectrum with 50 levels. The PC version conversion contains 100 levels, with variations on the same themes.

name: Quiz Tonosama no Yabou
summary: Quiz Tonosama no Yabou is an arcade quiz game framed like a Sengoku strategy sim. The player has to answer a certain number of questions correctly to conquer neighboring territory.

name: Quick Fill Q
summary: Quick Fill Q is a simple game where you have to fill the holes in the ground so the pink ball can keep rolling. When Q rolls past a certain distance, Q begins to speed up. When the game ends, the distance traveled by Q is recorded. Quick Fill Q is a non-stop, easy to learn puzzle game that provides hours of fun for the entire family.

name: Queen B: Book 1
summary: Queen B, Book 1 is the first book of the Queen B series. It is followed by Queen B, Book 2.

name: QuarterPole
summary: A horse racing simulation and stable management game published in 1993 by Microleague Interactive Software.

name: Quintet
summary: Quintet is a co-operative, cross-platform, multiplayer sci-fi game where players control the same ship through 5 roles - Captain, Helm, Tactical, Engineering & Science. Battle with other player crews over the Internet or LAN.

name: Quip Anomaly
summary: Quip Anomaly is a deep space dodge 'em up game. Guide Virnu to dodge hazards, acquire research, and obtain power ups. As you unlock each level, you will learn more about Virnu and her story.

name: QuentBlast
summary: QuentBlast is a cool indie RPG, where you bowl to attack! In this thrilling game of chance, the renowned Dr. Quent Blast has taken you on as his apprentice. As he shows you the art and science behind bowling, enjoy snappy, witty dialogue.

name: QuietMansion1
summary: QuietMansion1 is a horror escape game only released in Japan (in 2018). It was originally called KENGOHAZARD.

name: Quo
summary: A fidget toy designed for the Playdate

name: Qualification as Rogue
summary: A platformer combining fun controls and puzzles to solve traps

name: Queen of Hearts
summary: Queen of Hearts is a early pinball game. The ball is launched from the top right of the screen. The player controls flippers in the bottom half of the screen, and attempts to prevent the ball from falling through the hole in the bottom center of the screen. Gameplay features include: a "realistic" tilt feature, two different play fields, and 4 sequences which allow the player to rack up a large score if the sequence if struck in order. Each play field contains a variety of bumpers and bonus features. The player gets 3 balls per game, with the goal to maximize score. The player's score per ball is displayed on the right during gameplay.

name: Quagmire
summary: Released for the Macintosh in 1993, Quagmire is a puzzle platformer developed by shareware author, Tony Small. The gameplay involves typical platforming combined with firing at enemies with a bullet that follows a varying trajectory based on your mouse position.

name: Quadrant M4
summary: Annihilate the Sarkad and Onton Fleets in this arcade style galactic battle game. Gather resources to improve your craft by farming asteroids or destroying enemy craft/basestations! Over 20 increasingly difficult levels to complete the game!

name: Quake: Autumn Haunting
summary:
Your battle after Carved In Flesh continues in this sequel. A contrasting dark medieval castle full of unfamiliar foe."
A mountain castle/church with boss battle using DKTe3 textures with around ten new or modified monsters and three new weapons.

name: Qubo
summary: qubo is a minimalist puzzle game that challenges you to reimagine space and perspective

name: Queen Rules
summary:
This unique puzzle game invites you to explore enchanted kingdoms as you overcome fun, increasingly difficult levels. Beautiful clay art creates a magical experience.
Explore this hypnotic world built of handmade modeling FIMO clay characters. What's your vehicle? Logic and planning. It's a puzzle experience that's challenging but fun.

name: Quotle
summary: Quotle is a daily film quote guessing game. Your goal is to guess the film from the famous quote. Each time you make a guess you will get additional information about the film, the genres, the release year, who said the line, and the director of the film. You can leave the guess blank to skip forward to new clues

name: Quordle
summary: Put your skills to the test and solve four Wordles at once! You have 9 guesses to solve all four words. A new Quordle available each day to solve.

name: Qualia's Sweets Craft
summary: The witch "Qualia" only moves forward! Control the Qualia's familiar spirits to remove the obstacles that come her way and aim for the goal! A pop and cute 2D action puzzle game with mouse controls!

name: Quantum Break: Timeless Collector's Edition
summary:
Fix Time Before It Destroys Everything!

When time breaks, catastrophe becomes your playground. As hero Jack Joyce, you'll fight your way through epic disasters that stutter back and forth in time. But surviving this unstable world--and halting the end of time itself--is only possible by mastering your new time powers.

Released for Xbox One and as a Windows 10 exclusive on April 5th, 2016. Released Steam on September 14th, 2016.

name: Quest for King's Underpants
summary:
You knows; the King's life is not so easy. Especially if he lost his favorite underpants.
King Deridin has lost his precious underpants and he has entrusted you to find again them. But this is the easy part. The harder one will be to escape from the undergrounds.

Will you be you able to return to King Deridin with his precious underpants and gets the regal reward?

name: Quest to Aztlan
summary:
Lead your heroes to the lost city of Aztlan in this RPG and strategy game.
Quest to Aztlan is a RPG, adventure and strategy game in which you'll lead your heroes to the lost city of Aztlan. Face powerful creatures who protect this city in incredible real time RPG battles.
Are you prepared to discover the secrets of Aztlan and lead your heroes to victory?

name: Quadanoid
summary:
A breakout clone with a twist!

There are no walls, only paddles and bricks.
The idea is to use the paddles as walls and clear the level.
Each level brick layout is randomly generated and everytime you clear a level the movement speed increases.

Let's see how far you can get :)

Enjoy!

name: Quarterback Snap
summary: Strap your helmet on and step into the life-like practice facility of Quarterback Snap, an exhilarating football passing game for HTC Vive. Test your skills as a quarterback in training by racing against the clock to land as many passes as you can in the hands of your receivers. Extra points for speed and accuracy, so if you want a place at the top of our global leaderboard, you better bring the heat!

name: Quiet on Set
summary: Quiet on set! Action! Amidst a grand mansion, an elite movie production turns sinister with a sudden murder. Investigate, interview suspects, gather clues, and solve the murder. But beware, push too hard and you could be the next victim!

name: Queen of Honor
summary: Queen of Honor - is a classical 2D platformer with surviving elements where you have to do different levels as a brave queen Hola.

name: Quando fuori piove
summary:
Short game where you take control of two characters at the same time: a cop and a sniper. It's your job to stop the demonic activity in a palace.

Made in two weeks for the "Game Maker Italia 2018 Contest".

name: Quiet Invasion
summary: Swipe the screen to guide your ship through the Quiet Invasion!

name: Quest of Persia: Lotfali Khan Zand
summary: The story happens in the 17th century when the Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar controls the north and central part of Iran. After Lotfali Khan Zand has been betrayed by his minister Ebrahim Kalantar and loses his capital Shiraz, he decides to take the fortress close to the capitol called Zarghan and make it his command center. Little that he knew Ebrahim Kalantar, and Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar prepared a huge assault on Zarghan. He escapes to Kerman, where the second part of the game takes place...

name: Quake: Imhotep's Legacy
summary:
Large Egyptian temple with tech elements using sock textures. It comes with statue models, a few sounds, custom skyboxes, and a music track. The map source is included.

Note: This level requires Arcane Dimensions 1.8 and a source port with increased limits + BSP2 support.

name: Quantum Project
summary: Quantum Project - it's a platform 2D shooter, whose actions occur in the near post-apocalyptic future. Fight, survive and you will understand the value of life.

name: Quantum Beast
summary: Quantum Beast is a hardcore sci-fi stylish action fighting game where you need to execute massive crazy robots to save the city. Be sure fully acquiring various skills to pass through those hard battles.

name: Questy Chess
summary: Deep in an ever advancing computer, forgotten and unchanged, remains chess program v1. Peace is shattered by a software update! Can you stop the invading bytes before being overwritten?

name: Quadra
summary: Get good and get fast with Quadra, a high-speed match-3 game that will test your reflexes. Don't be a square, play Quadra!

name: Quick Rally
summary:
Quick Rally.
An arcade casual fastest time chaser.
Compete on the leaderboard against friends or anyone in the world to set the fastest time on each track.
A weekly challenge track, with a new track each week and a fresh clean leaderboard to compete for the best time.

name: Quest for the Golden Candelabra
summary: Lead a group of childhood friends in a series of difficult encounters played under the rules of PF2E, the second edition of a powerful tabletop OGL ruleset.

name: Qualia
summary: Qualia is an abstract shmup game.

name: Quattro Skills
summary: Quattro Skills is a game that includes 4 Codemasters classics.

name: Quantum Tripper
summary: Identification with something absolute and manifest as pure observation. Seeing things differently is a feature of our perceptual systems. Removed from the materialist plane of existence and world substantiation. Regions of the brain will find particular sets of images more challenging.

name: Quotidian
summary:
Wake up in the morning. Drink a cup of coffee. Close the curtains and go to bed. The days change, but the ritual does not.

This is a short game, taking typically less than 10 minutes to complete. The days do not loop even though it appears so at first glance - each day is different and you'll miss out on some interesting scenes if you only play first day!

Quotidian was made for Global Game Jam 2016. The game was made entirely in 48 hours, with the theme of 'Ritual.'

name: Quote
summary: A twisted, hand-drawn action RPG set in a fantastical world of absolute ignorance. All shall be pure of thought.

name: Queen of Phobos
summary: Queen of Phobos was an adventure game for the Apple II.

name: Quatro Luzes
summary: Quatro Luzes (from the Portuguese, Four Lights) is a 3D platformer game, where you have to swap between 4 worlds to proceed, using your brain and skill. You play as Atlas, a girl that lived in a blank, lifeless world, in her adventure to discover 4 colorful new ones!

name: Quasimodo
summary: Stop enemies from scaling the castle walls and ring lots of bells in this platformer from Synapse.

name: Quest for Sarah
summary: The history of the cursed Belmont bloodline is in the pages hidden throughout the game. Talking to the townsfolk will give you valuable information in finding Sarah before it is too late.

name: Quantum Physics
summary: A mix between urban surface areas and EDF undersea like installations.

name: QuickSpot: Master of the Right Brain
summary: Train your right bright with spot the difference puzzles in QuickSpot: Master of the Right Brain, a "spot the difference action" game playable solo or with friends.

name: Quiz Thiz USA
summary: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: Quarrel
summary: Quarrel is a thrilling word game. Compete to use your troops to make the highest-scoring word from the letters given then capture territories and conquer islands in this wholly original virtual board game.

name: Quo Vadis
summary: A multi-directional scrolling platformer in which the player has to explore a large maze on a quest to retrieve a scepter.

name: Qubes
summary: Qubes is an online 1v1 game where fast thinking, speed and focus are at the core of the gameplay experience. Challenge a friend or a random player in a match with a set of randomly generated rules, and try to color the majority of the map with the help of different powerups!

name: Quick Choice Girl
summary: An educational running game combined with fun quizzes. How many can you answer?

name: Quintic Warrior
summary: Top-down space shooter

name: Quantum Chess
summary: Completely change the strategy of the age old game of chess with quantum physics!

name: Quiz Thiz Germany
summary: Are you the new quiz master and can you beat your friends on this quiz? Answer questions about this country and collect valuable points! Also, learn new facts about this country while playing!

name: QuizMania
summary:
QuizMania is an italian exclusive collection of minigames that takes place in a network of tv channels. The player will be introduced to the game itself and to all the mini-games by its only host Raul Cremona, which interprets different characters, one for each game plus the menu and a pirate television that will randomly appear during the gameplay.
The included games are
- TeleTre: A classic quiz with a question and three possible answers
- TeleIndovinelli: A riddle to resolve, where the only input for the player is for revealing the answer
- TeleAnagrammi: with a given word, create another word by mixing its letters
- TeleRebus: write the phrase by resolving a riddle with a drawing and some letters
- TeleLabirinti: multiple letters are arranged in a square formation. The player has to connect all of them to create a phrase
- TeleIntruso: find the word that doesn't fit with the other four

name: Quake + Quake II Enhanced Bundle
summary: Play the authentic, updated and visually enhanced versions of Quake and Quake II, and experience the ground-breaking first-person shooters that inspire today's retro-style FPS games.

name: Quickclaw
summary: Quickclaw is a 2d action/platform fully handmade with sprite animations. Take on the role of Dynamo City's newest vigilante Quickclaw in her fight against organized crime with an original storyline and many new characters in order to give the experience to play into an animated series from the 90s!

name: Quest Hunter: Strangewood
summary: Strangewood is a story addition to Quest Hunter. Explore new locations, fight with new enemies, solve puzzles with new mechanics. Level up new skills and get new weapons and equipment. Play alone or together with your old and new friends!

name: QubeFall
summary: Dive into the world of CloudNone with this immensely addictive block puzzle game for Oculus Quest.

name: Quickscope Simulator
summary: This is the game where you quickscope and get care packages. This is Quickscope Simulator!

name: Quantum Sleeper
summary: Research Facility G-1-6 has gone dark. Your mission: reestablish contact and investigate the communication blackout. Equipped with AEGIS-scanner and a flashlight, uncover what is really going on here.

name: Quest On Full Moon Island
summary: One day a mysterious black pipe suddenly appeared in the Mushroom Kingdom, in front of the Toadstool Castle. Mario decided to explore inside it, and he was teleported to an unknown island called Full Moon Island. Little did he know that there wasn’t any way back… apparently. Other people were trapped there, so he began to roam around in search of an escape.

name: Quake: Five Rivers Land
summary: Five Rivers is a campaign in DOOM 3 hell-style, made by JPL for Quake in 2007. This episode has three small to medium-sized, dark, and scary maps, featuring new enemies, ambient sounds, and Doom 3 textures.

name: Quatro
summary: Similar to the board game of the same name, you must connect four pieces of the same color to win.

name: Quest of Persia: The End of Innocence
summary: The story begins with Iraq attacking Iran from the air, sea and land. Arashk who is an engineer working in Petrochemical plant, gets caught in the attacks, and has to escape the factory while it's burning into ashes. He meets Leyla an archeologist who is working in the desert. She is trying to find out the secrets of Ancient Persian Sites. Together they have to fight the Iraqi Invasion army, while trying to solve the mystery of Ancient Sites. Arashk and Leyla find a manuscript which provides them with information about secrets of Ancient Persian Sites. It gives them a clue about the famous battle of Agha Mohammad Khan Ghajar and Lotfali Khan Zand.

name: Quest? Quest!
summary: Take control of a hero in a completely ordinary and not at all suspicious fantasy kingdom. Will you accept your quest, train with knights, fight dragons, witches, and orcs to save damsels in distress?

name: Quick Tower Defence Ultimate
summary: Unlock upgrades, talents and colours for your towers to defend against scores of enemies. Battle on over 50 maps of varying difficulty, plus make your own or download more from the workshop

name: Quest for the Royal Jelly
summary: The king appoints Ibrahim a quest: find and slay the adventurer-eating, divine-claiming Royal Jelly. Join Ibrahim in his journey to find the Royal Jelly and rediscover the essence of tawheed!

name: Qual é a Música
summary: Test your musical knowledge in an exciting game that brings all the thrills of the famous TV show to your computer.

name: Quadbots: The Rise of Chrono
summary: Embark on a cosmic quest to retrieve shattered NOVANGEL orbs, conquer colossal guardians, and ultimately defeat Chrono. Dive into an action-packed adventure with epic battles and a gripping storyline.

name: Quest Giver
summary: You're an NPC who gives quests to heroes. Play through 7 scenarios in this humorous narrative adventure with management sim gameplay and a real sassy manager. Now get to work!

name: Quadruzzle
summary: Quadruzzle is an exciting word puzzle game. Each day you will be tasked with solving a new puzzle by guessing four words with clues. To solve the puzzle, you will move 15 lettered tiles into their proper place on a 4 x 4 grid of 16 slots with only one open slot to move tiles into.

name: Quick Drift
summary:
Quick Drift through 25 challenging levels!!
Then Drift the endless roads to see how far you can go!!

name: Quest: Escape Room 3
summary: The jolly party of Paul and his friends ends with a kidnapping. It turns out that they are locked in an abandoned factory by some maniac who decided to play a deadly game with them. Will they be able to solve all the riddles and escape from this dark place?

name: Quantum Drive
summary: Welcome to Quantum Drive! Get ready for the intensity of speed, where the streets are your playground, and speed is your ally.

name: Quad Desert Fury
summary: Quad Desert Fury takes games to the desert tracks aboard their ATV's. Riders compete against three other computer controlled Quads to stay on course and not wipe out while finishing with the best time.

name: Queen's Garden: Halloween
summary: Night fell, sending shivers down your spine. Will you persist? The Queen counts on your Match 3 bravery!

name: Quik: The Thunder Rabbit
summary: Quik the Thunder Rabbit is a side-scrolling platform video game, which Stywox developed for Titus Software to publish on the Amiga and Amiga CD32 in 1994.

name: Quantum Conundrum: IKE-aramba!
summary: Just when you thought you were done with rescue duty, it's up to you to save Ike! In this all-new adventure, rescue Ike and leap seemingly endless chasms as you travel through an all-new wing of Quadwrangle Manor.

name: Qullusrent3
summary: Break through various gimmicks to clear the stage! Clear the stage by moving all the blocks to the designated placement. We hope you will enjoy this unique puzzle game! Try to clear them while struggling to find a breakthrough!

name: Quake: Func Jam 5
summary:
A return to form for Func Jam, this pack features a start map and 8 maps of various themes made for WarrenM's Qonquer mod (included), which lets the player fight waves of monsters in arena-style maps, with the occasional assistance of minions. The theme for this jam was originally "Prisons of the underworld".

The map sources are included.

name: Qui Veut Gagner Des Millions
summary: Qui Veut Gagner Des Millions is a mobile game based on the French version of Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? for iOS.
developers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited
publishers: Sony Pictures Television UK Rights Limited

name: Quad Dice Defence
summary: This is a tower defense game where you use four dice to build a turret. The rolls of the dice are the ability value of "number of shots", "time reload", "damage(& range)" and "magazine". Try your best to clear all 40 stages, which are getting more and more difficult!

name: Quick Square
summary: Quick Square is a bright hardcore puzzle platformer.

name: QuickBite Express
summary: QuickBite Express is an ultra-dynamic platformer about the challenges of courier work. Deliver orders on time and undamaged across multiple cities to maintain your rating.

name: Quantum:Fantasy
summary: Quantum:Fantasy is a multiplayer RPG with an emphasis on hunting monsters. Combat is tight and responsive, varying based on chosen class: of the four, each has different weapons and skills to use in and out of combat. Level up, upgrade armor and weapons, and tailor each class to play how you like!

name: Quake: Travail
summary: Large-scale Quake mission with 15 SP levels (including a start map and two secret maps), custom textures, new monsters, items, and additional deathmatch maps.

name: Quake: Warp Spasm
summary:
Probably the evilest and most hostile atmosphere a Quake release ever had. This episode is built upon Quoth code and monsters. It comes with "dark ambient" music which adds to the feeling. The levels are huge, and the number of monsters in each one is extreme. An essential release, but clearly not for everyone.

This episode is three-hour-long for experienced players to clear.

name: Quiet House Massacre
summary: Can you reveal the dark secrets hidden in a familiar old, quiet house? The truth awaits revelation!

name: Quake: The Punishment Due
summary: A free DLC for the 2021 Quake remaster made from a mod for the original Quake.

name: Quote Unquote: Crossword puzzles meet famous quotations!
summary: A unique mix of crossword and famous (or not) quotations.

name: Quecksilber
summary: A fast-paced futuristic sports game, with accurate ball physics, retro and fun gameplay, heavily inspired by classics like Kick Off, NHL and Speedball.

name: Quest for Quintana Roo
summary: Yucatan Sam explores the temples of Quintana Roo searching for the keys to open the ceremonial vault and acquire the riches inside.

name: Quadrant
summary: Quadrant is a difficult rhythm game with trippy animations that get more and more intense, the better you play.

name: Quake Minus One
summary: Quake Minus One is an old school C64 tank game.

name: Queen City Chaos
summary: Queen City Chaos is a NES-style 8bit brawler adventure game set in Regina, Saskatchewan Canada. Explore a bizarre set of circumstances, fight enemies, upgrade your statistics, gain equipment and solve just what's causing all this chaos in this small prairie city.

name: Quarantine
summary: You have to transport people in this dangerous area. When you see someone with a sign hovering over him, stop by and pick him up. The destination place is visible on your minimap. For every ride you get some money. When you have enough money go to the garage where you can upgrade your car with plenty of weapons.

name: Quake: Func Jam 4
summary: The least popular Func Jam - a community project at Func_Msgboard. This pack features two large low gravity runic maps. The theme is "low gravity". The map sources are included.

name: QuizFizz
summary: Do you really know your friends or would you like to get to know them?

name: Queen's Golf
summary: Queen's Golf is a Japanese only golfing game for the MSX.

name: Quake: Doom Tintin Jam
summary: Community map pack: nine medium to large levels including a start map, using modified DOOM3 textures and running on the Arcane Dimensions mod (included). Also contains a few custom skyboxes and music tracks.

name: Queens Garden: Sakura Season
summary: It's Sakura Season in Japan and the Queen decided to celebrate! Help Queen Ayame and the loyal minister Haruo decorate this exotic Japanese garden in this unique match-3 game!

name: Quoth
summary:
"Welcome to the third edition of Quoth 2.0. This is a spit-and-polish release, with some new features to play with, but the emphasis on refining the Quoth 2 content, re-balancing some monsters, fixing old bugs, and keeping Quoth as lightweight as possible."

Quoth is an expansion pack for Quake 1 single player.

It is not intended as a series of thematically connected maps with additional custom content, as other packs are. The intention is to provide quality custom content for Q1 mappers and players in a single pak file. There are maps included in the pak, but there are also larger maps using the content already released separately by both Kell and necros, and more maps will surely follow.

Its features include technical additions for mappers, new monsters, and a couple of new weapons/items.

name: Quill
summary: Co-operative 3-player roguelike dungeon crawler. Adventure as brave actors who find themselves trapped in the powerful playwright's magical dungeon, and seek to uncover the mysteries of the Quill.

name: Quarantine Diary
summary:
Quarantine Diary is the 16th game in the Carol Reed series.
The game is 100% mouse driven and features a classic adventure game interface.
The game contains no graphic violence or any swearing. It has no action elements, and is suitable for ages 15 and up.

name: Quake: For My Babies
summary:
A sprawling, underground castle-clad episode in Daikatana E3 textures, with interesting progression, difficult secrets, new monsters, music, and a couple of other new features. Both a sequel and an update to This Onion. Resurrecting undead Ogres and Lava Men, what a nightmare!

Mike Woodham came back in 2013 to gift us this remake of his 1997 to 2000 mapping, and a remake of "This Onion". The definitive "Mike Woodman" map, encapsulates all of his works.

name: Quake: Retro Jam Egyptian
summary:
Retro Jam - Egyptian is the sixth Retro Jam organized at Func_Msgboard - featuring 17 small to medium-sized Egyptian-themed levels by various authors. It comes with custom visuals for the items and several skyboxes. Retro Jams are map packs designed for vanilla Quake and can be played with an unmodified engine.

This map pack is one of the biggest ever made, at 52615 Kilobytes, lasting up to six hours of playtime.

name: Quake: Coppertone Summer Jam
summary: Community mapping event based on the Copper mod: 16 levels of varying sizes and texture themes plus a start map. It contains custom skyboxes, a few new sounds/models, and some music tracks. The map sources are included.

name: Quantic Dream Collection
summary: No better time to experience a personalized journery with unforeseen possibiltities through three award winning Quantic Dream classics. Quantic Dream Collection includes - Detroit: Become Human, Beyond Two Souls, and Heavy Rain.

name: Quake 4: Lightning Fast Mod Doom Edition
summary: Quake 4 Lightning Fast Mod is a Doom mod for both single and multiplayer modes based on Quake 4

name: Quadrober Simulator
summary: Are you a quadrober?

name: Queen's Blade: White Triangle
summary:
A mobile game released on Bandai Namco's enza platform which allows the game to be played through any compatible web browser on PC or Mobile.

The game is based on Queen's Blade: Unlimted, an OVA reboot of the original show.
The game's website describes it as an armor break RPG, characters clothing/armor is damaged as they are injured in battle, with turn-based combat and it also has some card-based mechanics.

name: Quarantine II: Road Warrior
summary: You once again take control of checkered cab driver Drake Edgewater who was unsuccessful in escaping the doomed KEMO city in the first Quarantine. This time you will have your vengeance on OmniCorp and help the resistance rise!

name: Quicar

name: Qubie: Invader of Worlds

name: Queen's Blade: Spiral Chaos

With the new heroes, Cute and Jean, and the rest of the Queen's Blade competitors, they seek to find the root of this power and destroy it to restore balance to the land.

name: QuestLord
summary:
QuestLord is a single player first person turn-based adventure game in the style of Dungeon Keeper etc. Or was developed in 2012 by Eric Kinkead and released on the iPhone. An Android release came in 2013. 
 
In the game you are a QuestLord, an almost messianic figure destined to free the land of Norrab from cruel fate at the hands of the evil Lord Drazzik who plots to usurp the throne.

LOOK OUT! You're surrounded by science!!

It's in your skateboard. It's in your lunch. It's in that gooey stuff that collects on your Nintari powerpad... And it's in this box!!

Learn why planes fly, lightbulbs glow, magnets attract, and wrecking balls bash as you compete in a laser-fast science race with Quarky & Quaysoo. Along the way, you'll discover facts about chemistry, machines, thermal energy, and more of that important science stuff that's EVERYWHERE!

name: Quartz

name: Quacker Bros: First Heist

name: Quest 2: The Ancient Temples
summary: Taking place directly after the events of Quest - The Adventure for the 6 Stones in the year 2036, the Wooden Knight and his friends, Alex and Brian, discover that the six legendary stones have to be recharged due to not being used in a very long time. This takes them to a region of Light Island called the Solar Region, where they have to find six ancient temples that can bring back the power of the stones. Along the way, they meet new friends and new foes, as well as beings that were around during the time of the Hero of the Past.

name: Quiet Farm
summary: Join forces of a cow and a small alien and embark upon a fantastic adventure! Use the rich interactive environment to solve puzzles and fight your enemies. Be resourceful - not every cow gets a chance to save the world!

name: Quake: Marcher Fortress
summary:
While quite dated in 2005, was also quite early for singleplayer Quake 1 mapping.
Marcher Fortress impressed many with its Q3stone/metal-styled fortress of epic scale, with a few new monsters in lots of hardcore horde combat (almost 400 monsters in total) as well as its many other custom gameplay additions.
Marcher Fortress impressed many with its use of curved surfaces, as well as its vast landscape similar to the Halo games.

summary:
In a pretend educational game about Jesus, you play as Jonas, a guy learning about how awesome Jesus is.

Find Jesus and save another soul, learn about the deadly sins and how to please your Creator.

Though somewhat exaggerated, the game is not made to offend people of any faith or lack thereof, but takes the topic rather lightheartedly. Beware: Even some valid points may occur!

name: Quantum Redshift

name: Quitting Simulator

Armed with a quirky arsenal of improvised weapons (and trusty magic fishing rod) you set off on a quest to climb the corporate ladder, and free yourself from the shackles of bureaucratic oppression.

name: Quarantine Simulator

name: Queen's Brothel

Also features new and modified monsters, weapons, and items as well as a story in the vein of SOE unfolding throughout the maps, many custom textures, sounds, and skyboxes. The gameplay is very non-linear and very hard.

Play against others worldwide with exciting multiplayer features, challenge your knowledge with a variety of categories and questions, and experience the excitement of a brand new quiz trivia game.

Two medium-sized experimental vertical maps with a unique flesh-temple theme and very uncompromising low-gravity gameplay. Tronyn shows his love for Lovecraftian tales in this map pack; Nyarlathotep exploits the abyss, cosmic horror, and abstraction, all at once in its level design.

name: Quad Challenge
summary: Saddled on a high-performance all-terrain vehicle, you hear the roar of racing engines and scan the brutal dirt track ahead. The unforgiving clock counts down; THREE... strap helmet, TWO... rev it up, ONE... explode from the gate! Slam into high, and torque up to brain-warping speed! During tight cornering, cut hard, shift low, and fan the brakes. You'll feel huge racing tires claw for traction. Control four-wheel drift or you'll spin out. On straightways, you'll hit rises and go airborne. Throttle down to soften your landing. Challenge a computer-controlled rival, or compete head-to-head against your buddy. Choose from 9 twisting race tracks on practice mode. Choose from 4 vehicles, each with unique horsepower, handling, and acceleration features. Play the Circuit Championship, a 16 track password race to glory!

name: Quandino
summary: Falling-blocks game for playdate

name: Quest for Glory III: Wages of War
summary:
Wages of War is the third game in the Quest for Glory series. It is set in the Africa-like world of Tarna, where the hero travels with paladin Rakeesh, his new Liontaur friend he has met in the previous game. Shortly after his arrival, the hero learns about the conflict between the human Simbani tribe and the seemingly malevolent neighboring Leopardmen. It is now time for our hero to become a skillful diplomat and prevent an upcoming war between the two nations.

The basic gameplay system is similar to that of the two preceding games. The game has an adventure-like structure and gameplay elements, including puzzles to solve, inventory items to use, and characters to talk to, as well as a role-playing system with combat and character development. As in the predecessors, the player character can be either a fighter, a thief, or a mage; in this installment, the paladin class is selectable from the beginning of the game (unlike the previous game, where the hero could only earn the title of a paladin during the course of the story). Saved characters from the previous game can be imported.

Like in the earlier Quest for Glory games, the main character's parameters increase directly after battles or by repeatedly performing various actions. New to the series is an overworld map on which the hero travels between locations. Hostile encounters may occur randomly while traversing the map. Combat system is similar to the predecessors, with real-time battles where the player selects various offensive and defensive options.

Graphics engine and interface in this installment are the same as in the remake of the first game: it has 256-color graphics and an icon-based interface which was used by Sierra for their contemporary adventure games.
